div.head: Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 1
div.ab: Brahmarahasyaṁ, Prathamaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: saṅsa saṅgrahakāri sira movus| liṅnira|

app.note: = NīSāSam colophon; cf. StSt 670.1a: praṇamya śirasā liṅgaṃ; StSt 676.1a: praṇamya śirasā rudraṁ; StSt 679.1a: praṇamya śirasā sūryaṃ; VŚ 1: praṇamya bhāskaraṁ devaṁ
≈ StSt 670.6a: devadevaṃ mahādevaṃ; = DevīR 16.17a, JñĀ 17.1a, JñSĀ 2.1a, KMT 24.1a, ŚaktiSa 14.1a, etc.
cf. VBh 160ab: deva deva mahādeva paritṛptāsmi śaṅkara

div.p: śrī muni bhārgava| sira mahyun tumakvanakәn ikaṅ pada nirbāṇa ri bhaṭāra| maṅkana pvābhiprāyanira| manambhah ta sira ri bhaṭāra| śirasā| makakaraṇa hulunira sira| ri tәlasnira manambhah| mojar ta sira|| he devadeva| kita devaniṅ devata kabeh| he mahādeva| kita bhaṭāra mahādeva ṅaranta| he maheśvara| kita bhaṭāra maheśvara ṅaranta| he śaṅkara| kita bhaṭāra śaṅkara ṅaranta||

nāhan takvanaknani ṅhulun ri bhaṭāra| hana ya pada śūnya| ya sinaṅguh kamokṣan| ṅa| viśeṣa ya| ya śiva ṅaranya| nirīkṣyate| katon pva ya de saṅ yogīśvara| kutaḥ deśe| ndi tekā deśa katonanira| sājñā bhaṭāra| an maṅkana kottamaniṅ vuvus saṅ ṛṣi| ya ta karәṅə̄ de\ bhaṭāra||\\ deva uvāca| mojar ta bhaṭāra| liṅnira||
nihan vuvusani ṅhulun i kita| ikā saṅ mahāyogī| sira tumon bhaṭāra parameśvara| sateja sira lāvan tejaniṅ āditya sāyuta| ṅkā ri śarīranira mvaṅ ri hatinira||
lvir bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta muṅgu ri hatiniṅ sarva māvak| tar pādi| tar pamadhya| tar pānta| laṅgәṅ hananira| kadi jalacakra rūpanira| sira ta katon de saṅ yogīśvara||
ikā taṅ pada maṅkana| ya ta katon denta| makakaraṇa manahta| mvaṅ jñāna jitendriya| ṅkā ri tumpukniṅ hati| riṅ rahi|riṅ rahi| tәṅahniṅ hulu| maṅkāna vuvusani ṅhulun i kitaṅ vīra||

app.note: ≈ JñS 25.4cd: yatra yatra samudīkṣya| tatra tatraiva nirmalam

div.p: katon pvekaṅ pada maṅkana de saṅ yogīśvara| kapaṅguh ta ya ṅkāna denira| mvaṅ hana ta trikoṇa muṅgu i pucakniṅ padma| mālyaṅ ta ya vih||

app.note: ≈ NKār 30.18a: hṛdaye sarvadehīnāṃ; TUdgh 4.2b: hṛdaye sarvadehinā; cf. MBh app. 4.49 to 13.14.84d: hṛdisthaḥ sarvadehinām

div.p: lvirniṅ hatiniṅ sarva māvak| sumuṅsaṅ ya| muṅgvī pāntaraniṅ susu kālih| pratyakṣa pinakavitniṅ daśanāḍīdaśanāpī| viśeṣa ya| tumayuṅ lvirnya||

app.note: = KMT 16.3b; ≈ KMT 15.69b: nīlāñjanasamaprabhā; cf. RTP 43c: nīlāñjanasamadyutiḥ

div.p: ikaṅ mahānāḍīmahānāpi| muṅgv i hati| mahirәṅ malīt ya| mahāmṛta ya| paḍa tejanya lāvan nīlāñjana| ya ta dudug tәkeṅ hulu| an sake hati||

ṅkāna riṅ nāḍīnāpī| muṅguh ta bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta tinūt iṅ devata kabeh| śūnya sira| nirindriya| kinatayan ta sira deniṅ ṣoḍaśavikāra| uttama sira| tātar kәneṅ vikāra| sira pinakajīvaniṅ dadi kabeh||
lvir bhaṭāra śiva haneriya| vyāpaka nitya| meṅәt sira tañ cala| mevәh sirān kavruhana deniṅ hīnajñāna| sira tamar cala irikaṅ jagat kabeh| sthāvarajaṅgamāvaknya||
bhaṭāra mahādeva| sira ta nityomuṅgv inityomuṅguṅgu tumpukaniṅ hati| ṅkāneṅ sarva māvak| tar katahәnan| kady ākāśa lvirnira| sira ta katon de saṅ vruh riṅri jñāna||
ikā taṅ daśanāḍīpada nāpi| ya ta alivat saṅka ri hatiniṅ maśarīra| pәnuh riṅ rāt kabeh| kadi tejaniṅ āditya lvirnya||
hana ta nāḍīnāpi mālatī| ṅa| vvaluṅ ātus agə̄ṅnya saṅkeṅ rambut| tәkeṅ tumpukniṅ hati| makahīṅaniṅ nābhi| ikā taṅ nāḍīnāpi maṅkana| ya ta mahasukhatāmar suka bhaṭāra parameśvara||
mvaṅ hana ta nāḍīnāpi vaneh| nālaretakā| ṅa| kadi tejaniṅ meghāhirәṅ tejanya| rvāṅ kilan kaliṅkiṅan davānya| ya ta tәkeṅ kapāla| an saṅkeṅ hati||
nihan varahakna rumuhun i kita dvijendra| tar paśeṣa deṅkv amarahakәn ike||
hana ta yukti gavayakna saṅ paṇḍita| ya ta varahaknaṅku maṅke| bhaṭāra pinakesini hatinta| prayatnā ta kita dvijarājendra||

hana ta varṇa lima kvehnya| atiśaya tejanya| muṅgv i tumpukniṅ hati| mālyaṅ ta ya| lvirnya| ikaṅ rakta aghora| ikaṅ trivarṇa| bāṅ| putih| kṛṣṇa| ya tatpuruṣa| ikaṅ hirәṅ paḍa lāvan nīlāñjana| ya sadya| ikaṅ kadi tejaniṅ āditya| ya bāmadeva| ikaṅ kadi maṇik sphaṭika| ya īśāna| nāhan kramanya| kavruhana ta kitaṅ vīra||
hana ta pada śūnya| malilaṅ ta ya| viśeṣa ikā| mālit ya paramasūkṣma| ya kaivalya| ṅa| tar pakahilaṅan| tan pādi| tar pamadhya| tan pānta| ya kāraṇaniṅ dadi kabeh| ya kalīnanya||
tan karakәtan mala| tan palvir| tan pagatra| vyāpaka| yoṅgvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva| tar pacala| viśeṣa ya||
ikaṅ pada maṅkana| ya paramanirbāṇa| ya kaivalyapada| ya paramātmā| ya mahādeva| ya parameśvara ṅaranira||
hana ta śivapada| ṅa| paraṁ brahma| ṅa| ya tāṅәnaṅәnәn saṅ viku| makakaraṇaṅ manahnira| pinaṅguhnira pva ya| ṅkā ri tumpukniṅ hati| yatnā ta sira||
ṅkāna ry uṅgulnirāṅәnaṅәnәnirauṅguhnirā° ya| māti pvekā saṅ viku| mantuk ta sira ri pada bhaṭāra śiva| sayojya ta sira lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| makanimittaṅ yatnanira| maṅkana vuvusaṅkv i kitaṅ vīra||

hana ta padābāṅ| kadi tambagenapi lvirnya| paḍa tejanya lāvan maṇi padmarāga| kady āditya vāhu mәtu| mvaṅ kadi tejaniṅ apuy| viśvadeva hyaṅnya| muṅgvī hati| aghora vīja ṅkāna|| oṁ aṁ namaḥ| ya ta kavruhana saṅ viku| riṅ ākāśa| ry antaraniṅ manah| makakāraṇaṅ manahnira||

hana ta trivarṇahana trivarṇna| bāṅ| putih| hirәṅ| tatpuruṣa\ vīja ṅkāna| muṅgu ri hati| kadi vaṅkava lvirnya| mahirәṅ| mabāṅ| maputih| pañcatanmātra\ buddhi| ya ta makapada tatpuruṣa| vīja ṅkāna| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||
ikā ta vinarahakәnku| ya prāṇaniṅ sarva māvak| ya brahmamantra| mvaṅ hana ta varṇa mahirәṅ| vaiṣṇavīveṣṇava vīja ṅkāna| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| paḍa lāvan nīlāñjana tejanya||
ikaṅ abyakta viṣṇu ya| mijil saṅke vitniṅ hati| ri tәṅahniṅ hati| hana ta prabhā paḍa lāvan sūrya sāyuta tejanya| bāmadeva vīja ṅkāna|| oṁ bāṁ namaḥ||
saṅ hyaṅ brahma| ātmā sira| atiśaya kvehniṅ tejanira| paḍa sira lāvan tejaniṅ maṇik sphaṭika| brāhmī vīja ṅkāna|| oṁ īṁ namaḥ| mahāsūkṣma sira| sira īśvara| ṅa||
hana ta parambrahma| ātmā sira| ṅa| sira mahāsūkṣma| śāntas paramanirmala sira| sāvayava pramāṇa saṅkeṅsaṅka riṅ aṅguṣṭha||\ledpb
lvirniṅ pada ṅkeṅ śarīra| atyantevәhniṅ kakavruhanya| malilaṅ ta ya| tar pakahilaṅan ginave deniṅ akṣara| ndān kagṛhītanya nirakṣara yanirākṣaranirākṣaya| apan kasurudan sukhaduhkha||

sira ta bhaṭāra mahādeva| sira kavruhana de saṅ viku| samaṅkana vuvusani ṅhulun i kitaṅ vīra| viśeṣāṅaṅәnaṅәnviśeṣāṅәnaṅәn pva sira| mantuk ta sira riṅ śivapada| lvirnya| śūnya śānta| tan papaḍapaḍa riṅ viśeṣa| ya kamokṣan| ṅa||
deyānira saṅ yogīśvara| patәmvakna jugāvaknira lāvan bhaṭāra | sārisāri| sārisārisārisāri| maṅkana pva sira| ginәsәṅanira ta pāpanira kabeh| ṅkāne śarīranira| kady aṅgāniṅ apuy maṅgәsәṅi kayukayu||

saṅ yogīśvara sira tumunvīrikaṅtumunvīkaṅ pāpa sevu| kāṅkәn kayu\ ikā| makakaraṇaṅ jñāna viśeṣa| yāṅkәn apuya| tәlas pva sirān tumunvīriya| kapaṅguh taṅ kaiśvaryan denira| tar paśeṣa pva denira| kapaṅguh taṅ kamokṣan ginavayakәn| lvirnira||
pinaṅguh saṅ viku ikaṅ kaiśvaryan| vṛddhi ya| viśeṣa kumavaśākәn sarvabhūta gavayanya| yātyanta kamokṣan| ṅa| atiśaya riṅ mevәh||

div.head: Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 2
div.ab: Brahmarahasyaṁ, Dvitīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: nihan taṅ tribhuvana| ṅa| bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ| indraloka| ṅa| vinarahakәn de bhaṭāra| rakta varṇanira| aghora vījaniravīja sira| ikā taṅ aghora| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ pusәr| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada mahāloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ dakṣa prajāpati| gāyatrī vīja ṅkāna| ikaṅ gāyatrī tiga varṇanya| bāṅ| putih| hirәṅ| ya triguṇatrigaṇa| ṅa| sattva| rajah| tamah| kavruhana ikā| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ vtәṅ| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada janaloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| kinahanan ta ya deniṅ pañcaśuddha| lvirnya| avidyā| svabhāvapañcaśuddha| lvirnya| avidyā| svabhāvapañca-śuddhasvabhāva| lvirnya| aśuddhavidyā svabhāvapañcaśuddhasvabhāva| lvirnya| aśud-dhaviddhyā| svabhāva| prakṛti| pradhāna| abyakta| nahan taṅ viṣṇubheda| lima kvehnya| ātmā ya| vaiṣṇavī vija ṅkāna| mahirәṅ kadi nīlāñjana tejanya| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ hati| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||

lg.l: akarmatvānakarmmatvā mahāprabhameven in lieu of odd pada|

div.p: i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada tapoloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā| bāmadeva vīja ṅkāna| antarātmā kojaranya| prabhāmātra lvirnya| tan kinavruhan deniṅ indriya| tan pagave| tan ginave| uṅgvan saṅ puruṣa ya| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ dhadha| oṁ bāṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada satyaloka| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ rudra| īśāna vīja ṅkāna| paramātmā ya| viśeṣa ya| ya brahmamantrapada| ya jīva anadhika| ya kaiśvaryan| ṅa| malilaṅ lvirnya| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita ri vitniṅ gulu| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada śivapuraśivapuruṣa| ṅa| uṅgvan bhaṭāra śiva| akāra vīja ṅkāna| nirātmā kojaranira| alilaṅ śūnya| ya śiva ṅaranira| viśeṣa ya| kasurudan sukhaduhkha| vyāpaka riṅ sarvabhūta| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ gulu| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||
i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada uṅgvan bhaṭāra śivatara| ukāra vīja ṅkāna| atyanta nirmala śūnya| nitya viśeṣa ya| tan kәneṅ sukhaduhkha| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ laklakan| oṁ uṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada uṅgvan bhaṭāra śivatama| makāra vīja ṅkāna| viśeṣa ya| atyanta tañ cala| tan hanaṅ hyun iriya| tan hanaṅ sukhaduhkha| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita ri sәlāniṅ halis| oṁ maṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada kaivalya| ṅa| uṅgvan bhaṭāra paramaśiva| tan pādi| tan pamadhya| tan pānta| tan kavәnaṅ inaṅәnaṅәn iṅ manah| mvaṅ buddhi| oṁkāra vīja ṅkāna| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ rahi| oṁ oṁ namaḥ||

i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada paramakaivalya| ṅa| uṅgvan bhaṭāra paramaśiva| kālih lāvan bhaṭāra sadāśiva| oṁkāra vīja ṅkāna| tan kәneṅ garbhajanmamaraṇa| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ hulunira| oṁ oṁ namaḥ||
i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada vinarahakәn| uṅgvan bhaṭāra atyantasūkṣma| oṅkāra vīja ṅkāna| sadā hananya| tan hana adimadhyānta ṅkāna| ya ta nyāsaknanyasaśna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ jro kāpāla| oṁ oṁ namaḥ||
i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada uṅgvan bhaṭāra nirbāṇaśiva| oṅkāra vīja ṅkāna| ya sinaṅguh vikṣepaya sinaṅguḥ vākṣepaya sinaṅgaḥ vākṣepa| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ lyaṅiṅ kapāla| oṁ oṁ namaḥ||
i ruhurnikā| hana ta pada uṅgvan bhaṭāra paramanirbāṇaśiva| oṅkāra vīja ṅkāna| ya ta nyāsakna saṅ paṇḍita riṅ vunvunan|\ oṁ oṁ namaḥ| nāhan ta liṅ bhaṭāra| mujarakәn ikaṅ pada||

maṅkana kramanira| mahādeva iti| sira bhaṭāra mahādeva| ṅa||

lg.l: tathā jñātvātathā| pi| tvatathā| pitva mahādevaḥ|

div.p: sira saṅ yogī vruh ri bhaṭāra mahādeva| vyāpaka riṅ sarva māvak| kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa| vyāpaka riṅ sarva māvak| maṅkana riṅ kumbha makveh| inandәlan iṅ vulan tuṅgal| maṅkanāsimpәnmaṅkana simpәn iṅ nora| ulihniṅ kabeh| taṅkәs viśeṣa irikaṅ ṣadvarga| sirāta mantuk riṅ kamokṣapadan| tar pahīṅan lәpasnira||

devata vvalu bhedanya| lvirnira| brahmā| prajāpati| mahendra| somasomya| gandharva| yakṣa| preta| piśāca| nāhan ta bhedanya| mānuṣa tuṅgal| ndañ caturjanmacatujanma vilaṅnya| brāhmaṇa| kṣatriya| vaiśya| śūdra| nāhan taṅ caturjanma| ṅa| kunaṅ ikaṅ tiryaktīryyaktīyyak lima bhedanya| paśu| mṛga| pakṣi| sarisṛpa| sthāvara| nāhan bhedanya| de bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta eka viśeṣa umuṅgvviśeṣa| umuṅgv iṅ rāt kabeh||
bhaṭāra śiva sira vyāpaka| sira sūkṣma tar kәneṅ aṅәnaṅәn| kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa sira| tan kagṛhita deniṅ manah| mvaṅ indriya||

app.note: ≈ SMG 45.2 (mss.): kastre kastre| ya bahni| suksәmatvan vapalabyate; cf. SHH 63.4: kaste kaste yata bahәnniṅ suksmato vipalabyate

div.p: saṅ hyaṅ apuy hanerikaṅ kayukayu| ndātan katon| makanimitta sūkṣmanira| yathā| kady aṅgāniṅ ākāśa| maṅkana ta bhaṭāra mahādeva| an hana riṅ sarva māvak| ndātar kapaṅguh sira| makanimittaṅ sūkṣmanira||
inupāya pvekaṅ kayu| iṅusvan| umijil tekaṅ apuy| ṅkeṅ loka| samaṅkana ta bhaṭāreśvara| an kahiḍәp| makanimitta jñāna sirajñānanira| yoga paṅupāyanta juga||

saṅ yogīśvara| umaṅәnaṅәn bhaṭāra| jñāne manahnira| lvirnya| nirmala pratyakṣa hana riṅ sarva māvak| kady aṅgāniṅ tejaniṅ apuy| dumilah rūpanira| hinaṅәnaṅәn saṅ yogīśvara pva bhaṭāra| mantuk ta sira riṅ kamokṣan||

p.foreign: iti brahmarahasyanbrāhmārahasyanbrāhmārahasya nāma śāstram| dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 3
div.ab: Brahmarahasyaṁ, Tṛtīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: bhaṭāra rudra sātmakasātmyaka lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| nirmala sira| sira atiniṣkala| saṅka ri bhaṭāra rudra| mijil ta saṅ puruṣa| brahmā katattvanira| kadi tejaniṅ āditya| sira ta prabhu||

app.note: cf. Vṛh 30.4: cetananira sātmaka lavan bhaṭāra

div.p: saṅke saṅ puruṣasaṅkeṅ puruṣa| mijil taṅ avyakta| viṣṇu tattvanira| nitya kahananira| tan kavәnaṅ ginrahya deniṅ indriya| tan kavәnaṅ inaṅәnaṅәn| mevәh kakavruhanira| tamobhūta sira|tamobhūta sira| tan pacetana sira||

saṅka riṅsaṅkaniṅ avyakta| mijil taṅ buddhi| kuniṅ varṇanira| sattva pinakasvabhāvanira| viśeṣa sira| saṅka riṅ buddhi| mijilbuddhi| mijilbuddhi mijil taṅ ahaṅkāra| bāṅ varṇanira| rajah pinakasvabhāvanikā||

saṅkeṅ ahaṅkāra| mijil taṅ pañcatanmātra| hirәṅ varṇanya| tamah pinakasvabhāvanya| sakiṅ pañcatanmātra| mijil taṅ manah| saṅkalpa gavenya| manaṅkalpamanah kalpa| ṅa| mamilaṅ māṅәnaṅәn svabhāvanya| nāhan dadinya| saṅkalpa| vikalpa||
saṅkeṅ manah mәtuṅ ākāśa| vāhya ya| śabda guṇanya| saṅkeṅ ākāśa mәtuṅ bāyu| śabda sparśa guṇanya||
saṅkeṅ bāyu| mәtuṅ agni| śabda sparśa rūpaśabda rūpa guṇanya| saṅkeṅ agni| mәtuṅ apaḥ| śabda sparśa rūpa rasa guṇanya||

saṅka riṅ apah| mәtuṅ pṛthivī| śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha guṇanya| nāhan taṅ tattva rvavәlas kvehnya| rudra puruṣa| avyakta buddhi| ahaṅkāra pañcatanmātra| manah| ākāśa| bāyu| agni| apah| pṛthivī| nāhan ta lvirnikaṅ tattva| sa| ba| ta| a| i| vījanya||\ledpb

lg.l: tatra tatrāsīn abhūtaḥtatrāsin ābhūtaḥtatra tatrāsīn abhūtaḥra-vipulā|

div.p: ikā ta kapasaṅanikaṅ tattva rudrādi| ya ta pinakaśarīraniṅ jagat kabeh| kunaṅ bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta vyāpaka riṅ rāt| sira viśeṣa| siromuṅguh riṅ tattva kabeh||

nihan vibhāga bhaṭāra muṅgv irikaṅmuṅgva rīkaṁ tattvatatvatata kabeh| śarvasarvvajñasarvvajñā ṅaranira yan umandәlandәl iṅ pṛthivī| bhava ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ toya| paśupati ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ saṅ hyaṅ agni| īśāna ṅaranira yan umandәl iṅ bāyu||

bhīma ṅaranira yan haneṅ ākāśa| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| mahādeva ṅaranira yan haneṅ manah| tan māvak| ugra ṅaranira yan haneṅ pañcatanmātra| rudra ṅaranira yan haneṅ teja| makāvak ahaṅkāra||

lg.l: dhātāvyakto mahīṣṭhitaḥdhatavyakto mahīsthitaḥdhatāvyakto mahīsthītaḥdhatravyakto mahīṣṭhitaḥ← dhātāvyakte pratiṣṭhitaḥ (?)|

div.p: nihan kavruhakna| saṅ hyaṅ iśvara sira makasthānaṅ buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira abyakta| makasthānaṅ pṛthivī| saṅ hyaṅ puruṣa sira ta bhūtacaitanya| saṅ hyaṅ maheśvara sira ta pinakakāraṇanya kabeh| nāhan taṅ tattva rvavәlas| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| ri patuṅgaltuṅgalanya| ikaṅ tattva rvavәlas| ya tāṅәnaṅәnәnira| kapaṅguh taṅ kamokṣan denira| sayojya ta sira lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| tan pādi| tanpādi| tanpādi tan pamadhya| tan pānta| sira ta bhaṭāra parameśvara| ṅa||
ikaṅ mākas riṅ śarīra| pṛthivī ikā| ikaṅ drava riṅ śarīra| apahśarīra| apahśarīra apah ikā| ikaṅ apanas riṅ śarīra| agni ikā| ikaṅ molah riṅ śarīra| bāyu ikā||

lyaṅ iṅ śarīra kabeh| pinakahavaniṅ bāyu| ya ākāśabhūta| ṅa| ikaṅ manaṅkalpamanah saṅkalpa riṅ śarīra| manah ikā| nāhan tattvaniṅ śarīraniṅtatvaśarīraniṅ pañcamahābhūta inajarakәn| aghora vījanya| riṅ nābhisthāna| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||

ikaṅ pañcatanmātra| takāra vījanya| ya pratisāraniṅ ahaṅkāra| ikaṅ maṅaku lvirnya {\XeTeXglyph1561\relax}vih ya ahaṅkāra| ikaṅ buddhi mādhyavasāyamādva viṣaya gavenya| gauṇikā vījanya| riṅ udāristhānaudāristhāna| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||
ikaṅ avyakta| ya pinakapradhāna| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| riṅ hatisthāna| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||
ikaṅ puruṣa ya atikaivalya| ṅa| kadi tejaniṅ āditya tejanya| pauruṣa vījanya|pauruṣa vījanya| ri dhadhasthāna| oṁ baṅ namaḥ||
bhaṭāra śambhu sira kāraṇeṅṅkāneṅ hurip| kunaṅ ikaṅ akṣara brahmā| sira niṣkala| malilaṅ sira| sira parameśvara| ṅa| śuddha sūkṣma| laṅgə̄ṅ sira| riṅ gulūn uṅgu| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||

nihannāhan taṅ tattva pañcapada| ṅa| oṁ aṁ taṁ saṁ baṁ iṁ|| ya ta vyaktinya vinarahakәn tәkap saṅ paṇḍita| pinakaprāṇaniṅ bhuvana| kunaṅ saṅ vruh prāṇaniṅ śarīranira| sira ta mantuk riṅ bhaṭāra śiva||

lg.l: tat tu vāhyetatatvavāhāyatatvavātāya saṅkīrṇam(ex conj.) odd in lieu of even pada|

div.p: nihan ta vījaniṅ ambulu| atyanta lītnya| tātan hana bhedanya| bhedanikā| ṅa| ike vitnya| pāṅnya| rvānya| tan kinavruhan ikā kabeh| i vәkasan pvavkasan pvavkasan| pva ya mәtu taṅ luṅgah| saṅke vījiniṅ ambulu| vinə̄rakәn iṅ haṅin||
hana ta loka| ṅa| saptadvīpa| saptasāgara| saptaparvata| i tәṅahniṅ sāgarān uṅgu||
hana ta samudra ri tәṅahniṅ dvīpa| hana ta parvatasaṅgama ri tәṅah| hana ta pātāla pitu| ikā ta kabeh| bhūḥloka| ṅa||
saṅ hyaṅ āditya| mvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ candra| hyaṅ aṅgāra| hyaṅ buddha| hyaṅ vṛhaspati| hyaṅ śukra| hyaṅ śanaiścaraśaniścara| hyaṅ rāhu| hyaṅ dhūmaketu||

lg.l: antarikṣaṁ vidur vudhāḥantarīkṣa vidhur vvidhāantarīkṣa vidhūr vidhāantarikṣa vidhur vvidhā||

div.p: nakṣatramaṇḍala| aśvinyādi| tārāmaṇḍala bhomādi| hyaṅ dhruva uṅgvāni saṅ bhṛgu ikā kabeh| yekā ākāśa| ṅa| ya bhuvahloka vih||

lg.l: trividhaṁ śakramaṇḍalameven in lieu of odd pada|

div.p: saṅ hyaṅ daśendra| saṅ hyaṅ daśopendra|saṅ hyaṅ daśopendra| saṅ hyaṅ daśamahendra| nāhan taṅ śakramaṇḍala| tiga kvehnya| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

kunaṅ nāmaniṅ śakramaṇḍala| ya ta pājaraknaṅkve kita| saṅkṣepanya deṅkun avarah ri kita bhṛgutanaya| hana ta dānava māya| ṅa| hana ta kūṭāmita| ṅa|kūṭāmita| ṅa|kūṭāmita| hana ta rātri| ṅa| kapva nirmala ya||
hana varavācya kaniṣṭha| ṅa| hana vṛhaspāla| ṅa| hana sudarśanatapa| ṅa| hana ta deva len saṅkerikā| divya bhoganya||
sira ta saṅ hyaṅ indra kabeh| nāhan tādinira| kapva mahyun irikaṅ asthāna| ya pinakoṅgvanira| anekasahasra kvehnira| kapva makveh bhoganira||
kapvāta sira manuṅgaṅ riṅ airāvaṇa| paḍa sevu matanira| paḍa mahārdhika| nāhan ta kramanira| indraloka ginave nuṅgvī ya|| bhautikā vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||
i vәkasan pva ya| varahaknaṅ loka kaprajāpatyan| ya sthānaniṅ triguṇa| sattva| rajah| tamah| ya tekā sthāna i ruhur indralokaikā| viśeṣa ya| ṣoḍaśavikāra haneriya| nirālambananirālamba ya||

lg.l: mānaso me ’dhidevataḥme didevataḥeven in lieu of odd pada |

div.p: saṅkeṅ pañcatanmātra| mәtu taṅ manah| i vәkasan sakala ya| saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva hyaṅnya| manaṅkalpa gavenya| mahyuṅ mvaṅ elikmanaṅkalpa gavenya| mahyuṅ mvaṅ elikmanah saṅkalpa hayunya| mvaṅ elik viṣayanya||
ikaṅ ākāśa| śabdatanmātra guṇanya| ya maveh śrotendriya| mvaṅ sukha| yuktyaniṅ marәṅə̄ viṣayanikā||

app.note: cf. MBh 14.42.28cd: spraṣṭavyam adhibhūtaṁ ca vidyut tatrādhidaivatam

div.p: ikaṅ bāyu sparśatanmātra guṇanya| ya gumave kulit mvaṅ sukhaniṅmukha sparśa| saṅ hyaṅ ākāśa hyaṅnya||

app.note: cf. MBh 12.301.6d: sūryas tatrādhidaivatam even in lieu of odd pada

div.p: ikaṅ bahni rūpatanmātra guṇanya| ya gumave mata mvaṅ sukhamukha| saṅ hyaṅ āditya hyaṅnya| mulatanaṅ yukti viṣayanya||
ikaṅ apah| rasatanmātra guṇanya| ilatilik mvaṅ sukhamukha ginavenya| baruṇa hyaṅnya| maṅrasani bhoga viṣayanya||
ikaṅ lәmah gandhatanmātra guṇanya| ya gumaveṅ iruṅ mvaṅ sukhamukha| saṅ hyaṅ pṛthivī hyaṅnya| maṅambuṅ viṣayanya||

ikā taṅ buddhīndriya| vinarahakәn bhaṭāra kapila| an lima lvirnya| ndya ta nihan| śrotaśrote| tvak| cakṣuh| jihvā| ghrāṇa| ya buddhīndriya| ṅa| kunaṅ ikaṅ karmendriya| lima kvehnya| ya ta varahaknaṅkv ivarahaknaṅkvai kita||
ndah sakveh ta kita kabeh| kavruhananta tekaṅ pañcabuddhīndriya| sattvasatvasatya svabhāvanya| kunaṅ ikaṅ karmendriya| tamah mvaṅ rajah svabhāvanya||

app.note: cf. MBh 14.42.37cd: vaktavyam adhibhūtaṁ ca vahnis tatrādhidaivatam

div.p: ikaṅ vacana| ya śabdatanmātra ikā| pinakatәmahanya| muvusaknaṅ yukti viṣayanya| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara hyaṅnya||
ikaṅ taṅan| sparśatanmātra gavenya| saṅ hyaṅ indra hyaṅnya| maṅalapalap viṣayanya| bāyu hyaṅnya vaneh||
ikaṅ pāyu rūpatanmātra gavenyaya| saṅ hyaṅ maitrī hyaṅnya ṅkeṅ śarīra| maṅәntut aṅisiṅ viṣayanya| saṅ hyaṅ agni sirānarīra||
ikaṅ upastha rasatanmātra gavenyaya| saṅ hyaṅ prajāpati hyaṅnya ṅkeṅ śarīra| mamukti sukha viṣayanya| yā mәtvakәn reta mvaṅ mūtra| maṅkana ta vuvusaṅkv irimaṅkana vuvusaṅkv ī kitaṅ vīra||

lg.l: viṣṇudevas tathobhāyetato bāyuḥubhāye for ubhaye, m.c. |

div.p: ikaṅ suku kārva gandhatanmātra gavenyaya| lumaku maṅher viṣayanya| mamañcal| manaṇḍuṅ gavenya| ya ta dhāraṇәn de saṅ paṇḍita||

app.note: (cf. BhK 3.28d: bhautikān tu ’bhidhīyate [tu vidhiyate ; vidhīyate ; vīdhīyate ])

div.p: ikaṅ buddhīndriyaikaṅ karmma buddhīndriya lima kvehnya| pinakasukhanirapinakamukha saṅ hyaṅ pañcamahābhūta| nāhan taṅ tattva pinakaśarīraniṅ sarva māvak| inajarakәn aghora vījanya| liṅ saṅ paṇḍita| oṁ aṁ namaḥ||
pṛthivī| apaḥ| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah| mvaṅ daśendriya| ri heṅ ikā kabeh| ya ṣoḍaśavikāra| ṅa||

nihannāhan vuvusaknaṅku vaneh| ikaṅ dagiṅ mvaṅ tahulan| hotot| rambut| vulu suku| mvaṅ kṛṣṇa| vuṅsilan| paruparu| pusuhpusuh| hati| limpa| ikā ta kabeh| kaharan pṛthivī ṅkeṅ avak| makādi kulit| kavruhana yan dadiniṅ pañcamahābhūta||
ikaṅ rāh| mūtra| ariṅәt| hidu| sumsum| hutәk| dravaśrava jātinya ikā kabeh| ya apah riṅ śarīra| dadi saṅkeṅ pañcamahābhūta ikā||

lg.l: mukhe mahād api yo ’gniḥ← cāhavanīyo ’gniḥ; sa-vipulā|

app.note: cf. JñS 25.10: mukhe cāhavanīyāgniḥ gārhaspatyas tathā hṛdi| jaṭhare dakṣināgniś ca saṁvartaḥ pittake sthitaḥ

div.p: saṅ hyaṅ mahadagni ririṅ mukha| saṅ hyaṅ gārhaspatyagni ririṅ vәtәṅ| saṅ hyaṅ dakṣiṇāgni ri hati| saṅ hyaṅ sambartakāgni riṅ ampru sirān uṅgu||

app.note: ≈ ŚKJ 60ab: agnis tu pañcadhā bhinnaḥ śarīreṣu śarīriṇām

div.p: saṅ hyaṅ śucyagniaśucyagni riṅ pāyūpasta| saṅ hyaṅ cākṣuṣāgni riṅ mata| nāhan ta krama saṅ hyaṅ agni pañcamahābhūta| muṅgv iṅ śarīra kājar iṅ aji||

app.note: =/≈ STK 10.5cd; ŚKJ 60cd; SvT 7.17ab; Vṛh 39cd; AgPur 214.5cd, etc.

div.p: saṅ hyaṅ bāyu lima kvehnya| kavruhana de saṅ paṇḍita| lvirnya| prāṇa| apāna| samāna| udāna| byāna||
ikaṅ bāyu muṅgv imuṅgv iṅ śarīraniṅ dadi kabeh| tuṅgal| ya ta lima kvehnya| kramanya nihan| ikaṅ bāyu prāṇa riṅri mukha| ikaṅ apānaikaṅ apāna| riṅ pāyu| ikaṅ samāna riṅ hati||
udāna riṅ hulu| byāna riṅ sarvasandhiniṅ śarīra||
kapə̄| mata| hiruṅ| hati| pāyu| upastha| tahulan| ikā ta kabeh| ākāśakabeh| ākāśakabeh ākāśa ikā| pañcamahābhūta viśeṣa ya||
nāhan ta lvirnya| paḍa lima palenanya ya| pañcamahābhūta| ṅa| ikā ta kabeh| pinakāvakniṅ dadi kabeh| kinahanan deniṅ adhibhautikaduhkhaatibhotikaduḥka| mvaṅ ikaṅ adhidaivikaduhkaatidevikaduhka||
kunaṅ vibhāganya kabeh| nyan kramanyān pinasaṅakәn| savilaṅnya| saparanya||
ikaṅ iruṅ tṛpti ya riṅ gandha| hyaṅ pṛthivī sira sukha yan maṅkana|| ikaṅ hilat tṛpti ya riṅri surasaniṅ paṅan inum| apah pinakāvaknya| saṅ hyaṅ baruṇa sira sukha yan maṅkana| sadākāla sukha||
ikaṅ mata tṛpti ya manon iṅ rūpa varṇa| saṅ hyaṅ āditya sukha sadā yan maṅkana|| ikaṅ kulit| tṛpti ya riṅ sparśa| saṅ hyaṅ bāyu sira sukha sadā yan maṅkana||
ikaṅ taliṅa| tṛpti ya riṅ śabdātiśaya menak rinәṅə̄| tṛpti bhaṭāra bhīma riṅ daśadeśadeśa yan maṅkana|| ikaṅ suku kālih| tṛpti ya riṅ lumaku lāvan maṅheraṅher| bhaṭāra viṣṇu icchā sira yan maṅkana||
ikaṅ upastha tṛpti ya riṅ ānandaviṣaya| yapvan ādiārda ṅkāna| saṅ hyaṅ prajāpati sira sukha sadā|| ikaṅ pāyu| tṛpti ya riṅ maṅәntut maṅisiṅ| saṅ hyaṅ maitri sira tṛpti yan maṅkana||
ikaṅ taṅan tṛptitaṅan| tṛpti ya riṅ maṅalapalap| saṅ hyaṅ indra sukha sira yan maṅkana|| ikaṅ śabda tṛpti ya riṅ vākyaviṣaya| saṅ hyaṅ vaiśvānara sira sukha yan maṅkana||

nahannihan taṅ vāhyendriya kabeh| maṅkana taṅ manah| aneka kramanya| nihannāhan ta vuvusani ṅhulun ri kitaṅi kitaṅ vīra| ikaṅ manah tṛpti ya riṅ manaṅkalpamanah saṅkalpa| saṅ hyaṅ soma tṛpti yan maṅkana||
ikaṅ pañcatanmātra| tṛpti ya riṅ mavibhāga| bhaṭāra ugrarudra tṛpti yan maṅkana| ikaṅ ahaṅkāra tṛpti ya riṅ maṅaku| bhaṭāra rudra sira sukha yan maṅkana| makanimittaṅ guṇanira||

ikaṅ buddhi pva ya tṛpti riṅ mādhyavasāyaādhyātmaviṣaya| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara makavīja brahmamantra| sira tṛpti irikaṅ abyakta| tṛpti ya riṅ upādāna upadhānaupadhana| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira gumave tṛpti yan maṅkana||
saṅ hyaṅ puruṣa sira tṛpti riṅ cetana mvaṅ acetana| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira sukha yan maṅkana| kunәṅ bhaṭāra mahādeva| sira ta sukha kāraṇatva||

ikaṅ viśaya tan madoh riṅ avak svabhāvanya| ya ta gәsәṅana sahananya kabeh| i sәḍәṅnya gәsәṅsdhәṁnya gsәṅsdhәṁnyāṁgsәṅ ikaṅ sarvaviṣaya| irikā ta yan inaran śarīraśuddhasvabhāva| ṅa| ya ta sinaṅguh makāvak devata kita yan maṅkana||
nāhan ta kramanikaṅ tattva kabeh| kapva paḍa sukhasakha riṅ svaviṣayanya| kunaṅ baṭāra śiva| sira viśeṣa| sira vyāpaka riṅ sarvadeva kabeh| lāvan viṣayanya| sira ta muṅgv iṅ sarvabhūta||
ikaṅ vulu ṛṣi hyaṅnya| ikaṅ rāh tasik hyaṅnya| ikaṅ hotot lvah hyaṅnya||
ikaṅ tahulan gunuṅ hyaṅnya| ikaṅ vuṅsilan| ya ta himavān hyaṅnya| ikaṅ husus nāga hyaṅnya| ikaṅ dagiṅ saptadvīpa hyaṅnya| ya ta kavruhana hyaṅnya||
ikaṅ lambuṅ kālih| parvatasaṅgama hyaṅnya| vinarahakәn iṅ saṅ paṇḍita ikā kabeh| an pañcamahābhūtāvaknya| liṅ mahāmuni||
kunәṅ bhaṭāra śiva| sira tṛptīrikaṅ satva kabeh| kaliṅanya| yan sukha ikā kabeh| bhaṭāra śiva tuṅgal sukha sira yan maṅkana||

mataṅyan maṅkana| āpan ikaṅ sattva kabeh liṅniṅ tattva| saṅkeṅ bhaṭāra śiva saṅkanya| sira pinakaśarīra tattvaniṅ sattva kabeh| āpan sira kāraṇaniṅ dadi kabeh| ya ta katuturana de saṅ vruh riṅ tattva||
sakvehnikaṅ tattva kabeh| muṅgv iṅ bhaṭāra śiva| i vәkasan mijil saṅke sira| apa mataṅyan maṅkana| ri denyan pakaśarīra bhaṭāra śiva| laṅgәṅ hananikaṅ sarvatattvasarvatatvasarvasatva||
maṅkana pva bhaṭāra śiva| irikaṅ tattva kabeh| ri vәkasan līna ri sira muvah| nihan dṛṣṭopamanya| kady aṅgāniṅ vәrәh makveh vijilnya tuṅgal ya sakeṅ vvay||

lg.l: tattvaṁ līyatifor līyante, m.c. te punaḥ|

div.p: mijil pva yomuṅgv irikaṅ vvai saṅkanya| vәkasan līna ta ya rikaṅ vvay| kady aṅgānikā| iva maṅkana ta bhaṭāra rudra| sira ta kinahanan deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| sira śiva| sira vyāpaka| sira vibhuh||
sira bhaṭāra rudra| ṅa| sira ta rumakṣa ikaṅ rāt kabeh| yāvat ri kālanirān paṅrakṣa| tāvat irikā ta ya hananya nitya| aṅlīnakәn pva sira vәkasan| umantuk ta ya kabeh ri sira juga||

lg.l: dṛṣṭo ’pīndrajalaṁ mayamfor °īndrajālā māyā or indrajālamayam, m.c.||

div.p: maṅkana ta bhaṭāra rudra| kady aṅgāniṅ parigәl| hinyasakәninyāsakәn ya riṅ sabhā| donya hyunya maṅigәl| ri huvusnyān maṅkana| pinintonakәnya taṅ māyā indrajāla| yathā paḍanikaṅ rāt kәneṅ viṣayasaṅga| tan vruh yan kәneṅ māyendrajāla hyaṅ rudra||
iva maṅkana ta saṅ hyaṅ ātmā| kinahanan iṅhaneṅ aṣṭaguṇa sira| ginavenira tigāvaknira| brahmā viṣṇv īśvara| matūt sira katigata tiga| nāhan paramārthanirān tiga||
nāhan ta bheda saṅ hyaṅ ātmā| ātmā| antarātmā| paramātmā| nirātmā| pāt bhedanya| irikaṅ loka| sira pat vibhāganyapavibhāganya| ndanndah tuṅgal paramārthanira||
saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira ātmā| brahmā sira antarātmāātmārātmā| mahādeva sira paramātmā| bhaṭāra śiva sira nirātmā| ikaṅ ... inajarakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

lvir bhaṭāra śiva magave jagat| brahmārūpa sirān panṛṣṭī jagat| viṣṇurūpa sirān paṅrakṣaṅ jagat| rudrarūpa sirān amralayakәnrudrarūpanirāmralayakәnrudrarūpa sirāmralayakәn rāt| nāhan tāvaknirān tiga| bheda nāma||
bhaṭāra viṣṇu sira atmā| muṅgv iṅ manahniṅ rāt kabeh| ike bhaṭāra brahmā siromuṅguh ri manahniṅ devata kabeh||
bhaṭāra parameśvara muṅgv iṅ deva sūkṣma| paramātmā sira| bhaṭāra śiva sira nirātmā| mevәh kasthānanira| āpan sūkṣma śūnya sira||
ikaṅ jagat kabeh| sthāvarajaṅgamāvaknya| māyā svabhāvanya| rūpa bhaṭāra śiva sahananya| ikaṅ rāt kabeh| i vәkasan līna mare sira||

lg.l: yathotthaṁ mad iti sarvamyathottamam iti sarvve|
jagat tathā pralīyatejagat tatva vvalīyatejagatatva vvalīyate|

div.p: sakvehniṅ jagat kabeh| mijil saṅkeṅ bhaṭāra śiva ikā| līna riṅ bhaṭāra śiva ya||

p.foreign: iti brahmarahasyan nāma śāstram| tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 4
div.ab: Brahmarahasyaṁ, Caturthaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: ikaṅ pṛthivī līna riṅ apah| apah līnaapaḥ| līna riṅ agni| agni līna riṅ bāyu| bāyu līna riṅ ākāśa||
ākāśa līna riṅ manah| nāhan tattva nәm| ikāna gavenya| makasthānaṅ śarīra| inajarakәn bhautikā vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ|| ike taṅ tattva| śarīraniṅ pañcamahābhūta| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||
ikaṅ manah līna riṅ pañcatanmātra| pañcatanmātra līna riṅ ahaṅkara| ahaṅkāra līna riṅ buddhi| nāhan taṅ tattva sūkṣmāvaknya| gauṇikā vījanya| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||
nāhan taṅ tattva| pinakaśarīraniṅ devata rakva| nihan lvirnya| ikaṅ buddhi līna ya riṅ abyakta| tamah pinakasvabhāvanya| mālit ta ya||
tar kavәnaṅ hinaṅәnaṅәn| kadi ākāśa nirmala| mevәh kakavruhanira| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ abyakta līna riṅ puruṣa| oṁ baṁ namaḥ| vīja ṅkāna||
bhaṭāra brahmā sira puruṣa| ṅa| kady aṅgāniṅ ujvalaniṅ āditya rūpanira| atyanta śūnyanira| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| saṅ hyaṅ puruṣa| līna riṅ bhaṭāra śaṅkara| lvirira niṣkala||
bhaṭāreśvara sira satjīva| sira nirmala| śūnya sira| brahmeśānī vījanira| oṁ iṁ namaḥ|| ikaṅ tattva vinarahakәnku| ya ta kāraṇaniṅ pralayaniṅ jagat| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra||

kunaṅ saṅ yogīśvara| kumavruhi rikaṅ tattva| sira ta mantuk riṅ paramapada| hana ta tribhuvana| ṅa| śrota| tvak| cakṣuh| jihvā| ghrāṇa| vāk| sparśa| rūpa| rasa| gandha| pṛthivī| apah| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah| nāhan ta lvirnya| ri vәhaṅ-n uṅgu| gāyatrī vīja ṅkāna| vinarahakәnku| oṁ taṁ namaḥ| hana ta pañcaśuddhata pada śuddha hapada śuddha| ṅa| avidyā| svabhāvaavidyā| svabhāvaavidyā svabhāvanya| pradhāna| prakṛti| abyakta| nāhan taṅ lima| vaiṣṇavīveṣṇavīveṣṇavaveṣnavi vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||

hana sthāna viśeṣa| ya brahmākṣara| brahmā hyaṅnya| riṅ dhadhasthāna| pauruṣa vīja ṅkāna| oṁ baṁtaṁ namaḥ|| hana sthāna viśeṣa| brahmā vīja ṅkāna| brahmā paḍa hyaṅnya| brahmādhipati| ya muṅguh riṅ gulu| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||
ikaṅ oṅkāra| atyantapada śūnya| maruhur saṅkeṅ īśānapada ya| viśeṣa ya| ikā ta kavruhana patuṅgaltuṅgalanikaṅ loka| ya ta varahaknaṅkva||
ikaṅ bhūḥloka uṅgvaniṅ mānuṣa ikā| ikaṅ bhuvaḥloka| ya ākāśa| ikaṅ svaḥloka| ya uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ indra ikā| nāhan taṅ sinaṅguh tribhuvana| ṅa||
ikaṅi mahāloka| ya prajāpatiloka| ṅa| ikaṅ janaloka| ya viṣṇuloka| ṅa| ikaṅ tapoloka| ya brahmaloka| ṅa| ikaṅ satyaloka| ya śaṅkaraloka| ṅa||

lg.l: tad ekatattvameke tatvam ācalamfor acalam, m.c.|

div.p: hana ta sthāna viśeṣa| uṅkāra ya| tar pakasurudan| kunaṅ patuṅgaltuṅgalaniṅ aranira saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva| nihan ta byaktinyabyaktanya||

app.lem: varahaknaṅkva patuṅgaltuṅgalanirapatuṅgalanira saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva| gәgə̄n ta ya ri manahta| yatnā ta kita| maṅkana ta saṅ paṇḍita kabeh| yatna ta sira riṅ manahnira| ndya ta ya nihan|| pṛthivī| apaḥ| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah||

lg.l: bhūmyapo bhūr itibhūr apo brahmīti jñeyaḥ|

div.p: nihan taṅ triloka vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| vruh pva kite kavilaṅaniṅ loka| ikaṅ lәmah lāvan vvai| tinuṅgalakәn saṅ paṇḍita| ya bhūḥloka| ṅa| ikaṅ bahni lāvan bāyu| ya bhuvaḥloka| ṅa||
ikaṅ ākāśa mvaṅ manah| ya svarlokasarvvaloka| ṅa||
yathāw| kady aṅgānikā| evaṁ| samaṅkana taṅ abyakta| sūkṣma svabhāvanya| tar inaṅәnaṅәn tәkerikā| mijil taṅ jagat kabeh saka riṅ abyakta| sthāvarajaṅgamāvaknya||
nihan upodghātakna vaneh| ikanaṅ vvai mijil sakeṅ maṇi candrakānta| makanimitta kasaṅgamanyakasaṅkamanya deniṅ tejaniṅ vulan| i vәkasan akveh ta hilīnya riṅ lәmah||
tadvattat samaṅkana tekaṅ abyakta| atyanta ya riṅ sūkṣma| masaṅgama pva lāvan saṅ puruṣa| mijil taṅ tattva| buddhyādi| pṛthivyanta| mәtu saṅkeṅ abyakta||

sattva| rajah| tamah| yekā triguṇa| ṅa| viparītaniṅ guṇaviparītaniṃ guṇaviparīta nirguṇa| ya ta hetuniṅ jagat anjagat tan vәtu saka riṅ abyakta| viparīta ṅaranya| yan sattva utkaṭa| dadi mānuṣa| yan tamaḥ utkaṭa| dadi tiryak tikā| nāhan ta kramanya||
hana pañcaviparyāya| ṅa| hana aṣṭāviṅśatiśakti| ṅa| hana navatuṣṭi| ṅa|hana navatuṣṭi| ṅa| hana aṣṭasiddhi| ṅa||
hana karmayoni| lima kvehnya| hana pañcatapa| lima kvehnya| nāhan taṅ tattva limaṅ puluh| pinakāji bhagavān kapila| ukta sāra||
saṅka riṅ prakṛti| mәtu taṅ buddhi| brahmā hyaṅnya| vihikan viṣayanya| ikaṅ sattva yāmintonakәnya pintonakәn ya||

app.note: cf. MatPār VP 18.84d: rudras tasyādhidevatā (in the same context of ahaṅkāra = abhimāna)

div.p: saṅka riṅ buddhi| mәtu taṅ ahaṅkāra| ikaṅ ambәk tan aṅgā sora| saṅ hyaṅ rudra hyaṅnya| maṅaku viṣayanya| ya rajah| ṅa| ikā||
saṅka riṅ ahaṅkāra| mәtu taṅ pañcatanmātra| saṅ hyaṅ ugra devatanya| sira kāraṇaniṅ pañcamahābhūta|| svecchātanmātrapañcadhā| ikaṅ tanmātra lima kvehnyāsiṅ sakahyunya||
nihan lvirnikā saṅ prajāpati| bhagavān marīci| kaśyapa| viśvāmitra| vaśiṣṭha| bhṛgu| aṅgirasa| jamadagni||
sira ta kabeh| anak bhagavān prajāpati dakṣa mahārṣi| nāhan ādinya patbәlaspadblas kvehnya| paḍapaḍa riṅ kasiddhyanira| kapva paḍa caturmukha| caturbhuja sira| paḍa lāvan prabhāvaniṅ āditya sakoṭi||
sira ta muṅgv iṅ mahāloka| anantakoṭisahasra kvehnira| paḍa mahyun iṅ triguṇa| utpādakānugrahabhogātah sira| ya traiguṇyatrigaṇa| ṅa| paḍa gumave sattva| rajah| tamah||

gauṇikā mantra ṅkāna| ya uṅgvaniṅ sattva rajah tamah| nāhan ta kramanyānkramanyar vinarahakәnku| oṁ taṁ namaḥ|| hana sthāna uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| viśeṣa ya| ya pañcavarga| ṅa| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

nihan taṅ sinaṅguh pañcavarga| ṅa| bheda saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| avidyā| svabhāvaavidyā| svabhāvaavidyā svabhāvanya| pradhāna| prakṛtipradhāna| prakṛtipradhāna prakṛti| abyakta| nāhan taṅ viṣṇu lima bhedanya| viśeṣa ya| sūkṣma ya| vaiṣṇavīveṣṇava vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ||

lg.l: na kiñcid api niṣkalamniṣkaścalaṁniścalaṁniścalaṁeven in lieu of odd pada|

div.p: ikā taṅ pada| tan hana len saṅkeṅ sakaleriyasaṅkeriya| ya sinaṅguh viṣṇuloka| ṅa| lvirikaṅ devata hana ṅkāna| paḍa caturmukha| mvaṅ caturbhuja| sira gumave caturyuga||
paḍa madodot kuniṅ| pinәnuhaniṅ śrī| paḍa mahāsūkṣma| paḍāṅagәm khaḍga| cakra|paḍāṅagәm khaḍga| cakra|padhāṅagәm cakra| gadā| atiśaya kaiśvaryanira| makveh āyudha ginәgə̄nira| nityakāla||
sira ta gumavayakәn loka kabeh| utpattisthitilīnāvaknira| tan pādi tar pamadhya tar pānta| paḍāvāhana garuḍa sakvehnira||
tamaḥ pinakasvabhāvanira| maṅkana lvirnikaṅ devata muṅgviṅ janaloka| vaiṣṇavīveṣṇava vīja ṅkāna| oṁ saṁ namaḥ|| hana ta pada len saṅkerikā| tapoloka| ṅa| atyanta riṅ sūkṣma| kasurudan sukhaduhkha||
kadi tejaniṅ āditya rūpanira| nirmala śūnya tan pacala| tan hana katakutnira| puruṣatatpuruṣa vījanya|| brahmā hyaṅnya| sūkṣma saṅkeṅ sūkṣma sira| viśeṣa ya| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||
tan parūpa| tan pavikāra| tan pāpa| tan hīna| mvaṅ tar kәneṅ garbha jarājvara maraṇa| tan pakleśa||

saṅ devata hana ṅkāna| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ kāṣṭaiśvaryan| mvaṅ aṣṭaguṇa| tar pahīṅan tejanira| lvir saṅ ṛṣi hana ṅkā mahāsūkṣma| paḍa maṅulah kabrahmacāryan| paḍa maṅunyakәn brahmamantra| bāmadeva vījanya| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||
mahyun ta sira riṅ dhyāna sakvehnira| nirapekṣa ta sira riṅ viṣaya| śūnya nirmala sira| paḍa caturvaktra| paḍa maṅuccāraṇakәñ caturveda| paḍa kṣamarūpa sirakṣamārūpa sirakṣamārūpanira| kapva meṅәt||
tatan kәneṅ sukhaduhkha| tar kәneṅ ilik lāvan hyun| paḍa maṅgәgə̄ brahmāstra| śūnya sira sakeṅ śūnya| laṅgәṅ hananira| tar pakahilaṅan| tar kәna ri saviṣayaniṅ indriya||
tan pādi tan pamadhya tan pānta| vihikan ta sireṅsira riṅ sarvajñāna kabeh| nitya ta sira haneṅ tapoloka| tan kәna riṅ tuha pati||
tinilaraken ta sira deniṅ garbhajarāmaraṇa| tar kәneṅ kleśa mvaṅ viṣaya| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ kāṣṭaiśvaryan| tan pahīṅan tejanira| maṅkana lvirnikaṅ devata haneṅ tapoloka||
hana ta loka viśeṣa saṅkeṅ tapoloka| viśeṣaniṅ sūkṣmātisūkṣma| tan pahīṅan| mevәh kakavruhanya| mvaṅ kāṅәnaṅәnanya| śūnya ta ya| atiśaya riṅ malilaṅ| īśāna vīja ṅkāna| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||
tar pakahilaṅan| tan papaḍa| tar pagati| tan kagrahya deniṅ indriya| ṅkāna ta kahanan bhaṭāra rudra| atiśaya tejanira| tan pāśraya| tan kәneṅ hyun||
uttama ta sira deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| nirāśraya tar pagātrapagotra| tan pāvak| atiśaya ta sira riṅ viśeṣa| śūnya malilaṅ tejanira||
tiga varṇanira| a u ma| muṅguh ta sira riṅ uttamapada| śakti ta sira riṅ triguṇa| satva| rajah| tamaḥ| kinahanan ta sira deniṅ pañcaiśvarya| manidhi ya lvirnya| paḍa dhumāraṇañ jaṭā||
paḍa ta sirācihna vṛṣabhadhvaja| paḍa mavāhanaṅ lambu| kulavukkulavu ta sira deniṅ bhasma| ya pinakabhūṣaṇanira| paḍa mārdhacandra jaṭānira| makveh rūpanira| paḍa ta lituhayu paripūrṇa sira||

tar kәneṅ janma jarā tuhānvam mvaṅjvaratuhānvam| mvaṅ pati| tiniṅgalakәn ta sira deniṅ vyādhi mvaṅ śoka| nāhan ta lvirnira saṅ vatәk rudramūrti muṅgv i ṅkāna| ikā taṅ pada maṅkana| avayavaniṅ brahmamantra ikā| tar kәneṅ takut| ya ikā pada maruhur saṅkeṅ aruhur||
vruh pva saṅ viku ri sthāna| pinaṅguhnira ta ya| nāhan ta pramāṇaniṅ aṇḍa| makalakṣaṇa pramāṇaniṅ avak||
ikā taṅ padākṣara| saṅ hyaṅ pañcabrahmamantra| sa| ba| ta| a| i| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| pramāṇaniṅ jñāna| ya ta kavruhana| kunaṅ ikaṅ akāra| paramaśūnya| ikaṅ ukāra| ya paramārtha||
ikaṅ makāra| paramadivya ya| ikaṅ oṅkāraoṁkāra paramapada ikā| kunaṅ ikaṅ ardhacandra mvaṅ vindu| tiniṅgalakәn deniṅ akṣaramantra||
ikaṅ nāda mvaṅ nādānta| ya vākviśuddha| ya paramārtha| ṅa| katunan sukhaduhkha| nāhan taṅ aṣṭapada| ṅa| bhaṭāra aṣṭaśiva sira hana ṅkāna| ya mokṣapada| ṅa| liṅ bhaṭāra||
nihan taṅ pada śūnya kavruhana saṅ paṇḍita| ya paramārthamokṣa| ṅa| ya paramakaivalya| ya maheśvara ṅaranira||

lg.l: amāso na saṁbatsāramamāse ca sambatsāramta-vipulā; °sambatsāram in lieu of °sambatsaram, m.c.|

div.p: nā taṅ parameśvarapada| ṅa| tan hanaṅ māsa mvaṅ samvatsāra| tan hanāhorātra| tan hana vāyv ākāśa ṅkāna||

muvah liṅku| tan hanaṅ hapuy| tan hana vulan| tan hanārka|tan hanārka|tan hanārkkatan hanāditya tan hana vintaṅ| tan hanaṅ tahun| tar ana muhūrta| tan hana sāndhyāvela| ikā taṅ pada maṅkana| ya ta kamokṣan| ṅa| liṅ bhaṭāra||
guṇaniṅ lәmah| guṇaniṅ vvai| guṇaniṅ agni| guṇaniṅ bāyu| guṇaniṅ ākāśa| guṇaniṅ manaḥ| nāhan taṅ pada nәm| lvirnya| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||
ikaṅ tribhuvana guṇaniṅ bhūmi ikā| yoṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ indra ikā| bhautikā vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ|| ikaṅ pada mahāloka| guṇaniṅ vvai ikā| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ prajāpati| gauṇikā vījanya| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||

ikaṅ pada janaloka| guṇaniṅ teja ikā| yoṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| vaiṣṇavīveṣṇava vīja ṅkāna| oṁ saṁ namaḥ|| ikaṅ tapoloka| guṇaniṅ bāyu ikā| viśeṣa ya| ya uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā| raudrī vīja ṅkāna| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||

ikaṅ satyaloka| guṇaniṅ ākāśa ikā| atyanta viśeṣa ya| brāhmī vījanya| ya uṅgvanuṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ rudra| oṁ iṁ namaḥ|| ikaṅ oṅkāra guṇaniṅ manah ikā| ya śivapura| ṅa| uṅgvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ śiva| vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| oṅkāra vīja ṅkāna| oṁ oṁ namaḥ||

lg.l: na sadbhāvamna sambhavamnāsambhavaṁ anādhikamfor anadhikam, m.c.||

div.p: ikaṅ jāgrapada sadbhāvasambhava| nitya hananya| aṁ| vījanya|| ikaṅhananya| aṁ| vījanya|| ikaṅhananya| ikaṅ suptapada| sadasadbhāvaśabdasambhava| hana taya lvirnya| taṁ| vījanya| ikaṅ svapnapada| asadbhāvaasambhava| tan hana ya| saṁ| vījanya|| ikaṅ turyapada| viśeṣa\ ya| naiva sadbhāvanaiva sambhavanaivāsambhava| tan hana ya| baṁ| vījanya|| ikaṅ turyāntapada| tan pādi ya| na sadbhāvakasambhava| iṁ| vījanyaiṁ| vījanyawoṁ| vījanyaoṁ vījanya||
hana ta pada maruhur saṅkeṅ pañcapada| śūnya nirbāṇa| ṅa| pinakakanәmniṅ pada| saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva sira tuṅgal| ikā ta sinaṅguh ukṣapada| mahāpavitra| viśeṣa ya||
nihan taṅ saptadvīpa| ṅa| jambudvīpa| śaṅkadvīpa| krauñcadvīpa| kuśadvīpa| śalmalīdvīpa| gomedhadvīpa| puṣkaradvīpa| nāhan taṅ saptadvīpa vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||
nihan taṅ saptaparvata| ṅa| himavān| hemakūṭa| niṣadha| nīla| śveta| triśṛṅga| vindhya| nāhan taṅ saptaparvata| ṅa| katuturakna de saṅ paṇḍita||

lg.l: surāsvādu-tathā saptaḥsurasvādu tadā saptasurasvadu tadā sapta|

app.note: cf. JñS 24.2: lavaṇakṣīradadhikaḥ sarpiś cekṣur apo ’param| sūrasvādukalāḥ saptāḥ samudrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ (the plural endings in the edition are ex em); BhS 85: lavaṇakṣīradadhiś ca sarpiś ca surā tathā| ikṣuḥ svāduś ca ity ete samudrās sapta kīrtitāḥ

div.p: nihan taṅ saptasamudra| ṅa| ikaṅ lavaṇa tasik hasin| kṣīra tasik susu| dadhi tasik pə̄han asәm| sarpi tasik miñak| ikṣu tasik kilaṅ| surā tasik tvak| svadu tasik vuduk| ikā tataṁ saptasamudra vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||
ikaṅ tasik hasin| dumaśaguṇa ya riṅ jambudvīpa| ikaṅ dvīpa lәmah pinakasvabhāvanya| maṅkana kramanya| ikaṅ śaṅkadvīpa| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ tasik hasin| ikaṅ tasik susu| dumaśaguṇa ya riṅ śaṅkadvīpa||

lg.l: tato daśaguṇam vindyāttatvan daśaguṇav vindyāttatvan daśaguṇa vindyāt|

div.p: ikaṅ kuśadvīpa| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ tasik susu|| ikaṅ tasik pə̄han asәm| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ kuśadvīpa| nāhan ta kramanya kinavruhan saṅ paṇḍita||
ikaṅ krauñcadvīpa maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ dadhisāgara| ikaṅ tasik miñak| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ krauñcadvīpa| ikaṅ śālmalīdvīpa| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ ghṛtasāgara||

lg.l: tato daśaguṇaṁ vindyāttatva daśaguṇa vindyāttatva daśaguṇav vindyāt|

div.p: ikaṅ tasik kilaṅ| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ śālmalīdvīpa| ikaṅ gomedhadvīpa maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ tasik kilaṅ||

lg.l: guṇan tadvad daśam viduḥślokān tat dvidaśav vidhuḥślokān tat dvidaśa vidhuḥ|

div.p: ikaṅ surāsāgara maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ gomedhadvīpa| ikaṅ puṣkaradvīpa| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ surāsāgara| maṅkana liṅ saṅ paṇḍita| an varahakәn ya||
ikaṅ sāgara vuduk| maṅdaśaguṇa ya riṅ puṣkaradvīpa| ya vәkasniṅ maṅdaśaguṇa liṅ saṅ paṇḍita|| hana ta gunuṅ riṅ mānasagiri| ṅa| kinuliliṅan deniṅ gunuṅ cakravāḍa| ṅa||
ikaṅ gunuṅ mānasa| vvalu pucaknya| maṅdaśaguṇa ruhurnya| ṅkāna ri pucakniṅ gunuṅ| muṅguh taṅ deva viśeṣa| atiśaya tejanira||

lg.l: pūrve hemakuṭa-m-indrosa-vipulā with irregular preamble; hemakuṭam for hemakūṭam, m.c.|

div.p: kramanya| saṅ hyaṅ indra muṅgv iindra muṅgv iṅ puñcaknya vetan| saṅ hyaṅ agni muṅgv iṅ agneya| saṅ hyaṅ yama muṅgv i puñcaknya kidul| saṅ hyaṅ nirṛtinainṛti muṅgv i puñcaknya nairṛti||
saṅ hyaṅ baruṇa ri puñcaknya kulvan| saṅ hyaṅ bāyu muṅgv iṅ bāyabya| saṅ hyaṅ soma ri pucaknya lor| saṅ hyaṅ rudra muṅgv iṅ aiśānya| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ rudra ikā kabeh||
nihan kramanta ṅkāna| bhautikamantra riṅ aiśānya| mvaṅ pūrva| oṁ aṁ namaḥ|| gauṇikamantra riṅ āgneya| mvaṅ kidul| oṁ taṁ namaḥ||
vaiṣṇavamantra riṅ nairṛiti| mvaṅ kulvan| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| pauruṣamantra riṅ°mantra| riṅ bāyabya| mvaṅ lor| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||

brahmīśāna mantra i tәṅah| mvaṅ i sor| i ruhur| oṁ iṁ namaḥ|| kunaṅ pintiga i madhya| pintiga i sor| pintiga i ruhur|kunaṅ pintiga i madhya| pintiga i sor| pintiga i ruhur|kunaṁ pintiga i sor| pintiga i ruhur| avayavanya| kapva maṅdaśaguṇa ikā kabeh| liṅ saṅ paṇḍita||
pṛthivī| apah| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| manah| tanmātra| ahaṅkāra| buddhi| avyakta| puruṣa| īśvara| ikā taṅ tattva kabeh| viśeṣa ya| ya ta gumave bhaṭārabhāra maṅdaśaguṇa||

p.foreign: iti bhuvanakośan nāma śāstrambhuvanakośanāmaśāstraṁ| caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Brahmarahasya, Paṭala 5
div.ab: Brahmarahasyaṁ, Pañcamaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: an maṅkana vuvus bhaṭāra| matakvan ta saṅ munivara muvah| liṅnira||

he bhagavanbhagavān| kita kinahanankita| kita kinahanan deniṅ aṣṭaguṇa| he devadeveśa devadeveśā| kita ratuniṅ devata kabeh| nihan takvani ṅhulun ri bhaṭāra| yadin ikaṅ prāṇa tiniṅgalakәn ṅhulun ya| i sdhәṅ huluñ janmasaṅsāra| muvah ikaṅ mānuṣasattva| ri kālanya surud ya| an maṅkana| aparan ta gavayakna rānak bhaṭāra||an maṅkana| aparan ta gavayakna rānak bhaṭāra||

lg.l: kīdṛśaṅ kiṁ paraṁ mayamfor māyām, m.c.|
tattvāṅgaṁ tvayafor tvayā, m.c. me ’dhunā← tattvaṁ kathaya me ’dhunā (?)||

div.p: he deveśadeveśā| ndi taṅ hulun tumonahumona bhaṭāra| kīdṛśaṁ| mapa ta rūpanira| kim paraṁ mayam(pratīka) for māyām, m.c.| aparansaparan∙ śaktinira| kathaṁ nairātmyam āgacchet| tan pāvak karikā sira| katon māvak karikā sira|katon māvak karikā sira| tattvāṅgaṁ tvaya me ’dhunā| aparan tattvaniṅ avakta| an maṅkana ta pavaraha bhaṭāra maṅke ri ṅhulun||

lg.l: nirbāṇaṅ kathayasva mekathayam asekathayam asetkathāyam ase||

div.p: mataṅyan maṅkana vuvus bhaṭāra| yapvan vruh ṅhulun ri śabda bhaṭāra| tan kinasandehakәn pavehanya sukha| kadi tejaniṅ vulan| nirbāṇaṅ kathayasva mekathayam ase| varahakna tekaṅ kamokṣan ri ṅhulun| bhāvyād vā tava kāruṇyaṁ| makanimitta kāruṇya bhaṭāra||
hana ta pada kaivalya| ṅa| kapaṅgihaniṅ niraṅga||

app.note: ≈ BhK 3.45d: pṛthivī pañcadhā smṛtaḥ; ŚKJ 54a: pṛthivī pañcadhā bhinnā

div.p: ikaṅ pṛthivī lima guṇanya| gandha| rasa| rūpa| sparśa|rasa| rūpa| sparśa|rasa rūpa sparśśa śabda| laṅgәṅ hananya| mākas lakṣanaṇya| ya ta gumave aṅgapradhāna| dagiṅ| tahulan| hotot| ya ta pūrvakanya||
guṇaniṅ toya| rasa| rūpa| gandha| sparśa| tәñuh umilī lakṣaṇanya| rāh| mūtra| hariṅәtmūtra| hariṅәtmutra| hariṅәtmutra hariṅәt pinakādinya| saṅ hyaṅ ātmā svabhāvanya| pinakamūrtinya| viśeṣa ya||
ikaṅ teja| tiga guṇanya| rūpa| sparśa| śabda|rūpa| sparśa| śabda|rūpa| panas tis| māna lakṣaṇanya| tṛṣṇa mvaṅ krodha pūrvakanya| ya tejaniṅ śarīra| uttama ya||
nyaṅ bāyu rvā guṇanya| sparśa śabda| ya cañcala| ulah pinakalakṣaṇanya| urip pinakasvabhāvanya| nityakāla hananya| ya pinakacittaniṅ śarīra||

lg.l: śrotayoḥśotayoḥ ’bhayor randhrañvāyo rodhyañ cama-vipulā (with irregular preamble)|

div.p: nyaṅ ākāśa| tuṅgal guṇanya| śabda| umuṅguh ri lyaṅiṅ avakta kabeh| lyaṅniṅ hiruṅ adinya||

nyan vuvusaknādhikā| ikaṅ manah rvā vyāpāranya| ya manaṅkalpa riṅ sarvavastu| ndya ta nihan| ikaṅ rāt sakala sinādhyanya pūrvaka| i vәkasan niṣkala inaṅәnyanirmmala amṅanya| nāhan ikaṅ sandhīndriya kabehtabeh| ikaṅ pañcamahābhūta mvaṅ manah| ya sandhīndriya| ṅa| ri denyan kāraṇaniṅ indriya| nāhan mataṅyan sinaṅguh sandhīndriyasinaṅguh indriya| kunaṅ ikaṅ manah nirvikalpa riṅ sarvavastu| ri kālaniṅ śūnya ikā||

maṅkana pva ya| aṅәnaṅәnәnaṅәnaṅәn saṅ paṇḍita tekaṅ pada śūnya| ya śiva| ṅa| ya kaivalya| ṅa| tar pakahilaṅan| sinakalakәnsinalahakәn deniṅ manah ya vәkasan| huvus pva sira maṅәnaṅәn irikaṅ pada śūnya| uṅgvanira tekaṅ kanirātmyan sadākāla||

ikaṅ pada śūnya| atyanta niṣkalanya| malilaṅ tovi| tatan kapaṅguh ya sakapisansaṅka pisan ya| makanimittākvehniṅmakanimittākvehniṃmakanimita kvehniṃmakanimittākveniṃ pāpanya| maṅkana pva ya| aṅәnaṅәnәn saṅ paṇḍita| pratyakṣaknaṅ viśeṣanya||
aṅәnaṅәnәnira pva ya| katon tekaṅ jyoti hane dalәm denira| rayasthāli rayasthālī| ṅa| katon pva ya| dhāraṇәniradhāraṇanira ta ya| makanimitta deniṅ yatnanira||

lg.l: aṇuś ca paramāṇuś camanuś ca paramanuś ca|

div.p: kunaṅ ikaṅ\ jyoti| kadi mās inapi| sama tejanya lāvan āditya sevu| ya ta sinakalakәn deniṅ paramāṇu\ledpb\ kabeh||
ikaṅ tamah hana ya riṅ hati| vәkasan līna ta yalīna ya riṅ paramāṇuh| maṅkana pva ya| saha tejaniṅ divyajyotir iṅ avak| vvaluṅ aṅguṣṭha pramāṇanya riṅ antaraniṅ śirah||

maṅkana pva ya| tinon saṅ paṇḍita| ikaṅ kadadin tar pāvak| ṅkāna riṅ jyoti| lvirnya| śūnya lakṣaṇa saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva| maṅkin miṇḍuhur| hana ta pada niṣkala| ṅa| yātyantapada ikā| atiśaya lilaṅnya| tan hanaṅ kahyun iriyairikā||

app.note: ≈ JñS 25.3: śūnyaṁ su­nirmalaṁ pasyet manasaḥ suddha­karmaṇaḥ| sarvāṅge vimalaṁ bhūtam ākāśam iva nirmalam||

div.p: nihan ta lvirnikaṅ padātiśaya| śūnyanirmala ta ya vәkasan iṅ avak kabehavakta kabehavaktābeḥ| riṅ ākāśa tovi nirmala ta ya| ya ta katon denira| makakāraṇa manahnira laṅgәṅ tar byapāra riṅ len||

app.note: ≈ JñS 25.4ab: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaḥ-stham ca diśeṣu vidiśeṣu ca||

div.p: lvirnikaṅ pada| tumpaṅ miṇḍuhur| miṅsor| ya katon denikaṅ pañcamahābhūta kabeh| ri dalәm pṛthivī| apah| teja| bāyu| ākāśa| lvirnya| mvaṅ riṅ dikvidik||

app.note: ≈ JñS 25.4cd: yatra yatra samudīkṣya tatra tatraiva nirmalam

div.p: katon pva ya ṅkāna kabeh denirakabeh| denira| pinaṅguhnira tekaṅ manah atyantaśuddha ya| pisaniṅu kәnaha riṅ hyun||

lg.l: nirantaram vijaṁ(ex em) for vījaṁ, m.c. nyasetnirānantav vilambhiset||

div.p: nihan vuvusakna ri kitaṅ vīra| ikaṅ samādhi| akārayoga ikā| oṁ aṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ samādhi| ukāra| oṁ uṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ anantavidhi| makārayoga ikā| oṁ maṁ namaḥ| kunaṅ ikaṅ nirantarasamādhi| oṁkāra yoga ikā| oṁ oṁ namaḥ|| nyāsaknanira ta saṅ yatīndra||
vәkasan pva ya ta| hana ta kamokṣan atiśaya viśeṣa| mantuka siramantukaniraantukanira ta saṅ yogīśvara| tәka taṅ manah nirbāṇa| an maṅkana hilaṅ tekaṅ manah| lāvan indriyanira| māri mamikalpa||

lg.l: pṛthivyāṁpṛthivīṁ vā salila-vaina-vipulā (salila-vai for salile vai, m.c.)||

div.p: māri pva mamikalpa| śuddha ta ya| viśeṣa lilaṅnya| tiniṅgalakәn deniṅ guṇani kaiśvaryan| kunaṅ ikaṅ dadi kabeh| hana ya riṅ ākāśa| riṅ lәmah| riṅ apah||
kinavruhan saṅ paṇḍita| sakvehnikaṅ bhāva muṅgv iṅ bahni| mvaṅ bāyu| divya ya| katon tekaṅ pada denirapada| denira| katon pva ya| dhināraṇanira ta riṅ manah nityakāla||
tinonira ikaṅ pada viśeṣa| yan iṅ sabhā| yan iṅ śūnya| pinaran ta ya| katon tekaṅ manah malilaṅ| ri tәpәtnya riṅ śūnyari śūnya| makanimittaṅ jñāna viśeṣa||
pinaṅguhnira taṅta pada śūnya| tar pakahilaṅan ya| hilaṅ taṅ devata kabeh| vinava riṅ sūnya| ndya ta lvirnya nihan| brahmā viṣṇu mahādeva| aṣṭaśiva| mvaṅ oṅkāra||
tinonira pva ya tāriṣṭaniṅ sarvadeva| tinamākәnira riṅ śūnya| mvaṅ ikaṅ manah yatna| katon tan katon| lvirnya śūnya taya| ya ta tinamākәnira vaneh||
ikaṅ manah lāvan jñāna| nitya ya sdhәṅnirāmet hilaṅ riṅ śūnya| mvaṅ vikalpa lāvan nirvikalpa| tamākna ya riṅ śūnya||
vәkasan pva ya mokṣa ikaṅ manah| kadi roṇḍon maputәran tinūbniṅ haṅin| maṅkana taṅ pada svayaṁ riṅ avak| svayaṁ yan śuddha| svayaṁ yādi||

ikaṅ pada svayam| yar vәtu riṅvtu riṅvtuniṅ ākāśa| kadi vaṅkava ya|vaṅkava ya|vaṅkava| ya śuci ikā| bhūhloka| bhuvahloka| svahloka| mahāloka| janaloka| tapoloka| satyaloka| hana ta loka i ruhur ikā| ikā taṅ loka kabeh| ya ta kahalivatan de saṅ yogīśvara| i vәkasan pinaṅguhnira taṅ nirbāṇapada| lvirnya śūnya viśeṣa ya||
ikaṅ manah vulaṅun| makanimitta viṣayanikaṅ ṣoḍaśavikāra| magave hala pūrvaka| lāvan kavidagdhan| yadyapin maṅkanamaṅkana ha| śuddha ta ya mantuk riṅ śūnya hamәṅanya||

ikaṅ pāpa brahmahatyā pinakādinya| katmvanikaṅ kleśa| kāma pinakādinya| ikaṅ tattva kabeh| pṛthivī pinakādinya| ikaṅ saptabhuvana| bhūhloka pinakādinya| hilaṅ ya deniṅ nirbāṇatattva yan inulahakәn vәkasan||
yadi maṅkana| ikaṅ tattva kabeh| hilaṅakna sahananya| hilaṅ pva ya| mulih ta ya riṅ śūnyapada| ativimala kāvakanya| i sәḍәṅ ikaṅ manah mulih śūnya||

ikaṅ sadbuddhi| hana ya| aghora vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ sadasadbuddhivasadbuddhi| hana tayahana ya| gāyatrī vījanya| oṁ taṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ asadbuddhiavasadbuddhi| tan hana ya| vaiṣṇavīveṣṇava vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ na sadbuddhinaisadbuddhi| tan hana ya| raudrikā vījanya| uṁ baṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ naivāsadbuddhi| hana ya| tan hilaṅ| tan hilī| brāhmī vījanya| oṁ iṁ namaḥ||
nāhan tekaṅ pada lima| viśeṣa ya| kunәṅ ikaṅ pada kabeh| katuturana ya| maṅkanaṅ kanirbāṇanikaṅ manah yan śuci| ya oṁkāra| ṅa| uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭaśiva||

ikaṅ sadbuddhisatbuddhi| ya jāgrapada| ayogyahayvāgya vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita| aghora vījanya| oṁ aṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ sadasatbuddhi| ya svapnapada| gāyatrī vījanya| oṁ taṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ asadbuddhi| ya susuptapada| vaiṣṇavī vījanya| oṁ saṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ naiva sadbuddhinaisadbuddhi| ya ta tūryapada| raudrī vījanya| oṁ baṁ namaḥ||
ikaṅ naivāsatbuddhinaivasatbuddhi| ya paraṁ brahma| brāhmī vījanya| oṁ iṁ namaḥ| ikaṅ oṅkāra ya śūnya| tar pakahilaṅan||

kunaṅ de saṅ paṇḍita| inaṅәnaṅәnira taṅ kanirbāṇan| viśeṣa ya| tәlas maṅkana| kapaṅguh ta kaśuddhanikaṅ rāt kabeh| āpan ikaṅ vvaṅ| yadyastun aturuha| katutupana denikaṅ vigraha| humiḍәpa lara cetananya||
kepvan atah tvasnikaṅ vvaṅ kabeh| deniṅ kiṅkiṅnya| an gumәgə̄ luh ri matanya| vulaṅun ya mahosyanmahosan| maṅkana paḍanya| kumuluṭakkumuluṭuk kadi sulapit iṅ kuda||

ikaṅ maṅkana| katon sakvehniṅ duḥkha| kunaṅ vulatananira bhaṭāra śiva| sira tar kәneṅ saṅsāra| viśeṣa sira| huvus pva sira maṅәnaṅәn bhaṭāra| vulatananirekaṅvulatananirekā maṇḍala saṅ hyaṅ āditya sdhәṅ mapanas| halonalonatah denirār vulat||
yadyapi sira kasakitana tuvi deniṅ lara| ikaṅ pada śūnyaśūnyapada atah vulatananira| malona denira hayva sarag| hayvāpiṅvulaṅuna deniṅ kahidhәpnikaṅ atiśayadenikā| hidhәp ikaṅ atiśaya||||
vimbanira kadi tejaniṅ vulan| katutupan megha makāndәl| kunaṅ ikaṅ kamokṣan viśeṣa śūnya ya| atyanta lilaṅnyaatyalilaṅnya| evaṁ| nāhan ta lvirnya||
āpan ikaṅānikaṁ sinaṅguh śarīra| saṅ hyaṅ ātmā ya vәkasnikā| maṅkana pva ya| mantuk ta ya rikaṅ pada vinuvus ṅūni| tәkā tuvi saṅ hyaṅ atma riṅ pada| umuṅguh ta sira riṅ śūnya| tar pakahilaṅan||

i sdhәṅ saṅ hyaṅ atmān luput saṅkeṅ śarīra| pinaṅguhnira ta guṇaniṅ kaiśvaryan kabeh| paḍa sira lāvan tejaniṅ āditya sāyuta| hilaṅ ta pāpanira deniṅ jñāna| a u ma oṁ| nāhan taṅ jñāna pamisarjana pāpa||

saṅ hyaṅ ātmā hana riṅ loka| kadi vayaṅvayaṅan sira| kinavaśakәnira tekaṅ loka kabeh| vәkasanya keṣṭi| lvirirān pamor iṅ loka| pinaṅguhnira taṅ kaviśeṣan| tiga lvirnya| utpādaka| anirodhaka| lokavaśīkṛtalokavāśīkṛtta| nā taṅ tiga||

pinaṅguhnira pvekaṅ tiga| mantuk ta sira riṅ brahmapada| piraṅ ātusāvutus ivu kalpa lavasirān hana ṅkā| ri huvusnira haneṅ brahmapura| tәkā ta sira riṅ brahmalokānta| nāhan taṅ pada inujarakәnku| ri kaviśeṣaniṅ vruh riṅ brahmamantra||
ndā kapva sira ṅkāna| sarvajñāna ta sira| sira ta pinakaratuniṅ jagat kabeh| an haneṅ brahmapada| vәkasan pva ya| pinaṅguhnira taṅ kamokṣan| tar kәneṅ sukhaduhkha mvaṅ saṅsāra| viśeṣa ya||

maṅkana krama saṅ hyaṅ ātmā| mataṅyan deyadeha saṅ viku| haṅәnaṅәnәnira juga saṅ hyaṅ praṇava| tәlas vinarahakәn pūrvaka| hayvāsove| mantuk ta sira riṅ pada śūnya| kadi kilat rūpanira| an hana hilaṅ| kapaṅguh taṅ sukha nirbāṇa denira||

lg.l: nirbāṇam bhūtapiṇḍanambhūtapiṇḍadā (cf. JñS 21.2c ms. D K: bhutapindadaḥ; TK: pindanaḥ)||

app.note: ≈ JñS 21.2: praśāntaṁ dīpavac chuddaṁ śuddham indradhanur yathā| anantarā yena bahuṁ moktaṁ ca bhūtapiṇḍataḥ

div.p: lvir iṅ kanirbāṇan| kadi hurubniṅ dīpa śuddha| kadi vaṅkava śuddha lvirnya| ya pamiṇḍaniṅ pañcamahābhūta| yan tәkāniṅ lvirnyavighna makveh||

lg.l: nirbāṇaṁ sulabhaṁsulabhā(cf. JñS 19.2b: sulabhaṁ emn.; sulabhaś mss.; GPT 41b sulabhaṁ norm; sulabham ms.) caret|
tad idaṁ janmarahasyambrāhmārahasyaṁ(cf. JñS 19.2c and GPT 41c: janmarahasyaṁ)|

app.note: cf. JñS 19.2–3ab: sukhaṁ devaśarīratvam| nirbāṇaṁ sulabhaṁ caret| tad idaṃ janmarahasyam ādimadhyāvasānakam|| pravakṣyāmy adhunā vīra| ānte mahātmanaḥ

div.p: āpan ikaṅ kadadin| devaśarīra meman ya| ikaṅ kamokṣan memana ta ya| ya ta pinaṅguh de saṅ paṇḍita| ikā taṅ jñāna maṅkana| karahasyaniṅ janma ikā| ya ta vinarahakәnku| riṅ ādimadhyanya| mvaṅ avasānanya| niśśeṣa deṅku mavarah iri kita| āpan viśeṣa ya| maṅkana vuvusaṅkve ri kitaṅ vīra||

lg.l: śraddadhānośuddhadhāna( cf. JñS 19.4b: śraddadhāno emn.; śṛddhadhane mss.; GPT 42b: śraddhādhano emn.; śṛddhadhane ms.) jitendriyaḥ|

app.note: cf. JñS 19.4: labdhā bhedajnānaṁ śiṣyaḥ| śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ| dharmātmā vratasampanno gurubhaktis tathaiva ca

div.p: ikaṅ rahasya viśeṣa ya| ya ta hinumәn saṅ paṇḍita| mataṅyan deyaniṅ śiṣya| śraddhāśuddhā ta ya| satata tumutakәna svadharmaniṅ guru| magәlәma ta ya mabrata| bhakti ta ya maguru| maṅkana kramaniṅ śiṣya| hayva tan suśrūṣa riṅ guru| tar vvehana de saṅ guru ikaṅ vvaṅ tan gurubhakti||

yan śiṣya tar vruh iṅvruh riṅ vedaśāstra| tan vehananira ya| yan śiṣya ahaṅkārāvamānaahaṅkāra māna riṅ guru| tar vehәnira| yan śiṣya bvat mavәrə̄ tvak laṅgәṅ vәrәvәrәn tan vehәn ikā| yan śiṣya tan gumәgə̄ brata| tan vehәn ya| yan śiṣya kasyasih| tar vehәnira ya| muvah yan nīcanīccā ya tar vehәnira| yan śiṣya niṣkrama tan vehәnikā| yan śiṣya bvat maṅupәt riṅ guru| tan vehәnira ya||

riṅ śiṣyaśiṣya| guruśuśrūṣa| mvaṅ mahyun iṅ dharma rahasya varah saṅ guru| śāntacitta subhakti makadon kapūjāniṅ pāda saṅ guru| śiṣya nitya gumavayakәn i svakārya saṅ guru| mahyun i kagavayaniṅ tapa| ikaṅ śiṣya maṅkana kramanya| mahyuna ta saṅ guru mājarakәna ikiṅ dharma rahasya||

app.note: ≈ JñS 19.1, GPT 40 (with variant jñātā in d): idaṁ bhedajñānaṁ proktaṁ rahasyaṁ paramaṁ subham| bhuvanasya sarīrasya yo jñātvā sa śivaṁ vrajet||

div.p: ikā taṅ śāstra vinarahakәnku| viśeṣa ya| rahayu tәmәn ya| pinakarahasyaniṅ bhuvana lāvan śarīra| ya ta kavruhana de saṅ viku| ikā ta vruh riṅ śāstra ṅaranya| niyatanya mantuk riṅ pada bhaṭāra| an pavarah saṅ muni\ bhārgava| lāvan saṅ ṛṣi siddha muni paḍa maṅaji riṅ\ bhaṭāra||

p.foreign: iti bhuvanakośan nāma śāstram| brahmarahasyaṁ pañcamaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Jñānasiddhāntaśāstra, Paṭala 1
div.ab: Jñānasiddhāntaśāstraṁ, Prathamaḥ Paṭalaḥ

app.note: cf. JñS 27.3: kiṁ punar vayasā vṛddha ajñānaṁ kṣatalakṣaṇam

div.p: ṅuniyuni tekaṅ vvaṅ moha| tan pajñāna| tan śīla| tan gumavayakәn dhanadānadānadhanadādhanadhanadhana| tan iṅ vayah| tan iṅ tapa| hayva rakva tan panәmvaṅ pāpa||

lg.l: na dīrghaiḥ śmaśrubhiḥ keśaiḥdīrggha nāśubhiḥ keśo|

app.note: ≈ JñS 27.4: tena jñānena he skanda vṛddho vṛddhataraḥ smṛtaḥ| na dīrghaḥ nāśubhaḥ keśo na ca śvetena jātibhiḥ

div.p: saṅsiptanikā saṅ vidvan| saprayatnāsaṅ prayatnā ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna sira| sira ta matuhātәmәn| āpan matuha deniṅ jñānanira| maṅkanānaku saṅ kumāra| tan ikaṅ madavā kumisnya| tan ikaṅ atiśaya tuhānya| tan ikaṅ madavā rambutnya| tan ikaṅ maparas alәṅis keśanya| tan ikaṅ vvaṅtan ika vvaṅ aruhur kajātinya| ikaṅ sinaṅguh matuhāikaṅ matuha| ṅa||

app.note: ≈ JñS 27.5: sarvaśāstram adhiyīta tyajati jñānam uttamam| jñānam api na vindeta aho māyāvimohitaḥ

div.p: hana sira sādhaka maṅaji sarvaśāstra| ikā saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta uttama ināryakәnira| jñānaṁ vāpijñānav vāpi na vindetacindeta| ikā ta saṅ sādhaka maṅkana| tar vruh riṅ jñānaṅkuri jñānaṅku ikā| aho māyāvimohitaḥ| āpan kavәnaṅ deniṅ bañcanaṅku||

sarvaśāstrasya yat paramunmetrical (← sarvaśāstreṣu yat sāraṁ)| hana karih śāstra lәvih saṅkerikaṅ śāstra kabeh|
siddhāntajñānam uttamam| saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna sira viśeṣanya|
adhītyaaditya mānavomānavā loke| hana pva vvaṅ maṅaji saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna irikaṅ loka|
saphalan tasya jīvitam| ya ta saphala huripnyān haneṅ loka| liṅhuripnyān haneṅ loka| liṅhuripnya| haneṅ loka liṅhuripnya haneṅ loka liṅ bhaṭāra maṅkana pva ya||

ihatra ca mahādevimahādevī| riṅ ihatrakāla pva ya| kapaṅguh taṅ sukha māgə̄ṅ denya|
paratra śivatām brajet| irikaṅ dlāha pva ya| sayojya\ pva sira lāvan bhaṭāra śiva saduga||

evam etāni yuktāni| ikā ta aṅhiṅ hīṅaniṅ varahvarahku ri kita bhaṭārī| atyanta yukti tәmәn|
na sandeho varānane| tan saṅsāra ikaṅ kumavruhi riṅ jñāna maṅkana| maṅkana ta kita bhaṭārī| hayva saṅśaya irikaṅ varahvarah|
evam etāni sarvāṇi|
vacanāni suputrakasuputrakaḥ| maṅkana tamaṅkanāta kitānaku saṅ kumāra| hayva ta kita saṅśaya ri varahvarahku kabeh ri kita||

evaṁ jñānam mahādevi|
na prakāśati tattvavit| kunaṅ deyanira saṅ tattvavit| ike saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| vinuvus ta bhaṭārī|
rahasyan neryatāṁrahasyan nirataḥ tvayā| tar varahakna ya denta riṅ janma kuhaka| yapvan varahaknanta saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| saṅ vәnaṅ manūta maryādaniṅ guruyāga|
pañcapaṇadhanaṁpañcapadadhanaṁ yadi| ikaṅ mās kālih sapaha| yan maṅkana vehaknanira saṅ hyaṅ jñānasiddhānta| de saṅ paṇḍita||

div.head: Bhasmamantrasakalavidhiśāstra, Paṭala 2
div.ab: Bhasmamantrasakalavidhiśāstram, Dvitīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: vāhyotpattisthitilīnam| saṅ hyaṅ vindu| yeki varahaknaṅkv iri kita bhaṭārī| lāvan hyaṅnira| brahmā| viṣṇu| īśvara||

app.note: ≈ JñS 26.14: mano buddhir ahaṁkāraḥ śiva utpattir eva ca| brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaś caiva utpattir iti gadyate

div.p: saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira manah| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇuhyaṅ viṣṇu sira buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira ahaṅkāra| nāhan ta lvirnira utpatti vinarahakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

app.note: cf. JñS 26.15: viṣṇuś caiva śivo brahmā sthitir eva prakīrtitaḥ| buddhir ahaṁkāro manaḥ sthitir iti smṛtaḥ

div.p: nihan byaktanirān sthiti| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira ahaṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira manah| nāhan ta lviriṅ sthitinira||

app.note: cf. JñS 26.12: śivo brahmā hariś caiva pralīnaṁ ca nigadyate| ahaṁkāro mano buddhiḥ pralīṇaṁ ca prakīrtitam

div.p: lviriṅ pralīnanira nihan| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira ahaṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira buddhi| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira manah| nāhan ta lvirnirān pralīna| inajarakәn saṅ paṇḍita||

app.note: cf. GPT 39: ukāre līyate ’kāro hy akāre vā pralīyate| makāro pralīnam etat parasvarga udīryate;GPT 51: okāre līyata ukāro akāraś ca pralīyate| makāro bindau saṁlīno bindur nāde pralīyate; JñS 18.12: ukāre līyate ’kāro makāraiva pralīyate| makāro vindau saṁlīno vindur nāde pralīyate (≈ 3.1, with variant akāro me pralīyate)

div.p: nāhan tattva saṅ hyaṅ vindu| abhyantara pralīna| saṅ hyaṅ ukāra| līnaukāra| līnaukāra līna ri saṅ hyaṅ akāra| saṅ hyaṅ akāra līna ri saṅ hyaṅ makāra| saṅ hyaṅ makāra| līna riṅ vindu|| nihan prayoganira saṅ hyaṅ utpattisthitipralīna| uṁ aṁ mam||
nihan tattva saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra| yan saṅ hyaṅ rudra sira oṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ ukāra sira umā| yan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira oṅkāra| saṅ hyaṅ ukāra sira svāhā| ya dampatī| ṅa| kavruhana saṅ paṇḍita||
vruḥ pva sira riṅ ādi deva saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra| gavenikāoṅkāra| gavenikāoṅkārāgavenikā karaśodhana rumuhun| mvaṅ mantranira| huvus pva sira maṅkana| gavayakna taṅ bhasmamuṣṭi| mvaṅ śivīkaraṇa||

apahapa ta ginave saṅ paṇḍita bhasma nihan| ike saṅ hyaṅ brahmamantra kaharan kayva| saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra kaharan apuya| gumәsәṅīkaṅ kayu| bhaṭārī umā sira ta dilahniṅ apuyhapuy| bhaṭāra rudra sira kaharansira ta kaharan kukus||

vruh pva saṅ paṇḍita ri kagavayanira saṅ hyaṅ bhasma| ya ta mataṅyan pamūjā sira ri saṅ hyaṅ agni| saṅ hyaṅ brahmamantra sira kaharanbrahmamantra kaharan vīja| ya ta pamūjānira ri saṅpamūjānira saṅ hyaṅ agni| saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra mvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ svāhā| sira ta kaharan apuyahapuya| sira pinūjā saṅsira ta pinūjā de saṅ paṇḍita|| bhasmaśeṣa saṅ hyaṅ apuy sovesove| ya ta bhasmakna saṅ paṇḍita||bhasmaśeṣa ... paṇḍita
ndya ta lvir saṅ hyaṅ bhasma nihan| saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra sira bhasma| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira vvai| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā sirāpuya| sira ta tatan paśeṣa mokṣanira||

nyan kavruhana de saṅ mahyun uṅgvān iṅ bhaṭāra| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā riṅ karatala| pratyakṣa sira ṅkāna| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu pūrva sira| saṅ hyaṅ śiva riṅ sarvāṅgulipūrvvāṅgulipūrvvaṅguli sira| enak pva ya vruh saṅ sādhakapaṇḍita| ri tattva saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| lāvan kanyāsanira||
saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma kavruhana saṅ sādhaka| irikaṅikaṅ karatāla vedi| ikaṅ aṅguli ya samītsamit| tulisniṅ karatāla ya padmamaṇḍalapadmamaṇḍala||
saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma pañcadeśaknanirapañcadeśanira| mvaṅ mantra unyāknanira| sa| pūr| ba| da| ta| pa||sa| ... pa||

app.lem:
uttaryāghorakaṁ sthānam| a| u|
mūrdhni mūrddhnimūrddhi-m-īśānam eva ca| i| ri vunvunan|
liṅgamūrdhni mukhaṁ śivam| riṅ liṅgari liṅga riṅ mukha| bhaṭāra śiva| mvaṅ riṅ mūrdhni|
yad īkṣaṁyad dīkṣaṁ sthāpayen naraḥsthāpaye naraḥ| ya ta ṣaḍaṅga bhaṭāra śiva| inadhiṣṭhāna riṅ mūrdhni| ṅkāna ta devatanikaṅ dik vidik| adhiṣṭhānәn saṅ sādhaka| ndya ta lvirnya nihan||

lg.l: pūrvāsyam īśvaram vindyātpūrvva syād īśvarav vindyāt|

div.p: hyaṅ īśvara riṅ pūrva| brāhmā riṅ dakṣiṇa| mahādeva mukha bhaṭāra kulvantulvan| hyaṅ viṣṇu mukha bhaṭāra riṅ uttara| nāhan ta sthānaniṅ devata riṅ dik vidik ikā| samaṅkanavidik ikā| samaṅkanavidik| ikā samaṅkana juga bhasmakna saṅ sādhaka| nihan vaneh||nihan vaneh||
punuk| rahi| gulū| bāhu kālih| hati| susu kālih| vәtәṅvtәṅvhaṅ| nābhi| valakaṅ| suku kālih| nā taṅ bhinasman saṅ sādhaka| nityasa sirār pabhasma||
lanā pva saṅ sādhaka mabhasma| ya ta mataṅyan śuddhā tāvaknira| de saṅ hyaṅ bhasma| mvaṅ ikaṅ yoni tiryak| dukut| kayukayu| ikā ta kabeh lәpas ikā de saṅ hyaṅ bhasma||
ṅuniveh devata kabeh| mvaṅ daitya dānava mānuṣa| saha siddha cāraṇa makādi| mvaṅ samūhaniṅ manūtmanuk| mokṣa ikā kabeh| denira saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma||
maṅkana pva kadivyan saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| ya ta mataṅyan yatnā ta saṅ yogīśvarān gumәgә brata saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma||

app.note: ≈ RauSS 8.13ab: sakṛt samudrasaṁyogād vibhāgo naiva kalpate; RauSS 8.10d: hy avibhāgāya kalpate

div.p: lanā pva saṅ yogī| makopajīvana saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| śivasayojya sira| saikatva lāvan bhaṭāra śiva| kady aṅgāniṅ pasaṅyoganiṅ kilat mvaṅ samudra||

āpa mataṅyan sayojyasaṅyojya saṅ paṇḍita| pakopajīvanamakopajīvana saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| nihan saṅ hyaṅ oṅkāra ktā puruṣa| saṅ hyaṅ svāhā sira prakṛti| bhaṭāra viṣṇu sira oṅkāra| bhaṭārī śrī sira svāhā| maṅkana kaṛṅvānira riṅ loka| kavruhana de saṅ paṇḍita||
yapvan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā pinakaoṁkāra| saṅ hyaṅ sāvitrī sira svāhā| nihannāhan mataṅyan viśeṣa saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma||
nāhan mataṅyan viśeṣa saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| saṅ hyaṅ trisamaya hana riṅ bhasma| bhaṭāra viṣṇu sira sakāra| bhaṭāra śiva sira makāra| bhaṭāra brahmā sira bhakāra| nā ta lvirnirān tiga dadi eka||
nihan ta byaktanya| ikaṅ bhakāra magave jagat| ikaṅ makārāmralayakәn rāt| ikaṅ sakāra rumākṣeṅ jagat| nāhan vyaktiniṅ tuṅgal mapalenan||
bhaṭāra brahmā sirotpattisirotpati| bhaṭāra viṣṇu sira sthiti| bhaṭāra rudra sira pralīna| nāhan taṅ tiga pinakaśaraṇaniṅpinakaśāraṇaniṅ pinakaśaraṇa riṅ loka||

omapa ta lvirniṅ loka| makaśaraṇa tәlu ya| maṅkana ikaṅ rāt kabeh| lvirnya nityānitya| lanā tan lanāvaknya| utpatti sthiti pralīna| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā pinakādinya| mataṅyan tan ahyun saṅ tattvavit irikaṅ loka||
saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā sira magave jagat| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira rumākṣeṅ prajā| bhaṭāra rudra sirāmralayakәnsirāmralayekәn rāt| ikaṅ rāt mvaṅ sthāvarajaṅgama| yekā pinralīnakәn de saṅ hyaṅ rudra||

lg.l: ūrdhvam vā vaṣaḍ ātmanāeven in lieu of odd pada|

div.p: ike taṅ mantra bhaṭārī| avakniṅ hulun ikā| lāvan ikaṅ mantra vaṣaṭ| umuṅgv i ruhur| yekā kavruhananta bhaṭārī||

lg.l: muktaḥ koṭiś ca janmanāmbhasma koṭiś ca rambhatāḥ||

div.p: kalīṅanikaṅ dadi vvaṅ| yāvat ahurip| mataṅyan avaknya| pariśuddhәn yapariśuddhanya deniṅ bhasma| maṅkana ikaṅ śarīra| tāvat tiniṅgalakәn deniṅ svajīva| āpan ikaṅ avak| mokta ya ri vәkasan| adyapi riṅ koṭikoṭi janma| gumavayakәna kābhyāsan saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| maran tan kataman pāpa| makaphala kapavitraniṅ avaknira||

ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅabhyāsa ri saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| adyapi sāvakanya| yan lanaṅa| yan kәḍi kunәṅ| yan strī| yan śudra| yan tucchajanma| ikā ta kabeh bhaṭārī| yan tәpәt denya kumavruhī saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| ikā ta yan tiniṅgalakәn de saṅ hyaṅ hurip śarīranya| mantuk ta ya riṅ pada bhaṭāra śiva| ikaṅ vvaṅ vruh tattvaniṅ bhasma|| \\
\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ iti bhasmamantrasakalavidhiśāstram| dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Jñānasaṅkṣepa, Paṭala 3
div.ab: Jñānasaṅkṣepaṁ, Tṛtīyaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: deva uvāca|
tәlas kavicāran saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| inujarakәnku ri kita bhaṭārī| kunaṅ phalaniṅ nityaśoca| pājaraknaṅkve kita vaneh||
ikaṅ roṇḍon pinakaśoca| sevu phalanya| yan dina dina| ikaṅ pṛthivī pinakaśauca| sātus hivu phalanya| ikaṅ jala pinakaśoca| sāyuta phalanya||

bhasmaśauca-phalan dadyāt|
sahasrakoṭitatphalam| nihan phalaniṅ bhasma pinakaśoca| sevu koṭi phalanya|
aprameyaṁ jñānaśaucam| hana ta kapiṅlimaniṅ śoca| aṅhiṅ jñānaśoca juga lәvih sakiṅ śoca kabeh| ya tikā aprameya phalanya| yekā pavarahaṅkve kita bhaṭārī||

nihan ta kramanya| ikaṅ roṇḍon pinakaśoca| kaniṣṭhā ya| ikaṅ lәmah pinakaśoca| madhyā ya| ikaṅ jala pinakaśoca| uttamā ya| mataṅyan lәvih sakeṅ rvanmadhyā ya ... sakeṅ rvanmāddhyā ya| ikaṅ vvai pinakaśoca| lәvih sakeṅ lәmaḥ|māddhyā ya| lәvih sakeṅ rvan| bhasma pinakaśoca| lәvihpinakaśoca| lәvihpinakaśoca lvihpinakaśoca| lvih(an undiscernible akṣara before lvih was deleted); saṅkeṅ tiga||

ikā taṅ roṇḍon lәmah vvai bhasma| an pinakaśoca| alah deniṅ jñānaśoca juga| aṅhiṅ jñānaśoca uttama saṅke rikā kabeh| rahasya saṅkeṅ rahasya| yekā kavruhananta bhaṭārī| deyanta kumavruhīrikā| sarvaprayatnāsarvvaprayatna kiteriya| donikān kinavruhan| hilaṅaniṅ saṅsāra| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra riṅ bhaṭārī||

l.sic: kim bhasmanaḥ vījaṁ yadā|vījaṁ yadā|vīja yathā

div.p: liṅ bhaṭārī| aparan ta lvirniṅ vīja saṅ hyaṅ śivabhasma| sājñā bhaṭāra| yan sāmānya vīja rikā| mvaṅ āparan ta mantranira| yan sāmānyamantra kunәṅ| apa samantraaparan mantra kari ya| tan pamantra kunәṅ| maṅkana riya sājña bhaṭāra| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭārī|\\ deva uvāca| liṅnira||
liṅ bhaṭāra nihan| ikaṅ bhakāra rūpa bhaṭāra brahmā ikā| ikaṅ sakāra rūpasakāra| rūpasakāra| rūpa saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu ikā| ikaṅ makāra īśvararūpa ikā| ya ta kavruhanantakavruhanta āku ikā katiga bhaṭārī||
ndya kārikā sinaṅguhan bhasma| sira ta sahajakna riṅ śarīra| sira sakalaniṣkalabhasma| ṅa| kunaṅ saṅ vruh irikā| sira ta mokti| ṅa||

nyaṅ sakalabhasma| ṅa| ikaṅ śarīra ya sakalabhasma| ikaṅ jñāna ya niṣkalabhasma| ṅa| aparan ikaṅ jñāna lәvih saṅkeṅ jñāna muvah| saṅ vruh riṅ jñānabhasma| sira ta lәpas| makanimittaṅmakanimitta jñāna viśeṣa||
ya ta mataṅyan deya saṅ vruh ri saṅkṣepanira saṅ hyaṅ bhasma| sira tatan apilih ri kagavayanira| halahayu ginavayakәnira juga niyatanya| āpan evәh ikaṅ kamokṣan denira||
ikaṅ jñāna bhaṭārī| viśeṣaniṅ sarvatattva kabeh ikā| muvah evәh ikā katәmvanya| ya kāraṇaniṅ svarga mokṣa||

maṅkana kātiśayankātiśayam saṅ hyaṅ jñāna bhaṭārī| mataṅyan hayvā kitāmarahakәn ya riṅ vvaṅ len| mvaṅ riṅ śiṣya tar sevaka| yan apa lviriṅ śiṣya varahәn riṅ jñāna| mahārdhika ta ya| mārūm ikaṅ ākṛti mvaṅ ulahnya| yan maṅkana vehәn ya riṅ adhikājñāna| saha vidhividhāna carvādi||
ndya tāvaknikaṅ jñāna varahakna nihan| ikaṅ trigaṇa ya| lāvan tatpuruṣa| mvaṅ īśāna| trigaṇa ṅaranya| sādyo| bāma| aghora| kunaṅ ikaṅ tatpuruṣa| vindu| ikaṅ īśāna| nāda||

patәmunikā kabeh| ya ta sinaṅguh praṇavākṣara| kinahanan ta ya deniṅ vindu nāda| ya ta kavruhana de saṅ mahāpaṇḍita| vruh pva sirerikā| tātan valuy aṅjanma sira muvah| tar patәmahan| mvaṅ tan kavastu deniṅ rāt kabeh||

etat taṁtvaṁ sakalaṁ jñānam| saṅ hyaṅ praṇava sira sakalajñāna|
etat taṁtvaṁ svargam eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ praṇava sira svarga|
etat jñānañ japec caiva| ikā ta saṅ hyaṅ praṇava| kavruhana de saṅ paṇḍita| japaknanira sira|
yo jñātvā yātiyadi yādi muktatve| pinakajapanira saṅ hyaṅ praṇava| lәpas ta sira||

brahmā prakṛti-vijñeyaḥ| nihan ta kavruhana saṅ vidvan| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira pradhāna|
viṣṇur ātmā bhavet tathāātma basan tataṁātma ṇasan tathā| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira ātmā|
paramātmā bhavet rudraḥ| bhaṭāra rudra sira paramātmā|
antarātmāantarātma sadāśivaḥ| saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira antarātmā|
ante sūkṣmaḥantasūkṣmaantasūkṣmā nirākāraḥ| saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva sira vәkasan| sūkṣma tar pāvak|
sa eva parama-smṛtaḥ| mataṅyan katuturana saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva de saṅ vidvan||

śivaś śivatamo jñeyaḥ← śivāc chivataro jñeyaḥ| saṅ hyaṅ śivatama lәvih sira sake saṅ hyaṅ śiva|
śivāc chivataraṁ smṛtam| saṅ hyaṅ śivatara sira lәvih sake saṅ hyaṅ śivatamaśivatamā|
śivāt sadāśivan devidevī| saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira lәvih sake saṅ hyaṅ śivatara|
paramaśivam abyayam| saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva lәvih saṅke saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva| tan pakasurudan sira||

śivaś ca paramo nādeparamanāde parapanāde|
nāda-m-īśāna-m-eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva muṅgv iṅ nāda| īśānāvaknira|
sadāśivasyanāda śīvasya yad vījam|
vindauvinduḥ tatpuruṣas tathā| saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira muṅgv iṅ vindu| tatpuruṣāvaknira||

sadārudrasya yad vījam|
candra-m-aghora-m-eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ sadārudra sira muṅgv iṅ ardhacandra| aghorāvaknira|
sadyojātas tu he skandaskandhaḥ|
strīpuṅso yugapat smṛtaḥ|| ikaṅ bāmadeva mvaṅ sadya| pradhānapuruṣāvaknya| yugapat ikā kālih| katuturana saṅ paṇḍita||

idaṁ rahasyakaṅ jñātvā| mataṅyan deya saṅ vruh rike saṅ hyaṅ rahasyajñāna bhaṭārī|
kathitan te varānane| tātan varahakna ya|
devatānām manuṣyāṇāṁ|
durlabhaṁ mokṣam āpnuyāt| kunaṅ ikaṅ devata| daitya| manuṣya| vruh irikaṅ kamokṣan| tar vruh pva sira ri saṅ hyaṅ haji| tan siddha mokṣa ikā| kunaṅ saṅ vruh rīke saṅ hyaṅ haji sira ta mokṣa| ṅa||

nādād vinduḥ samudbhūtaḥ| ikaṅ vindu mәtu sakiṅ nāda|
vindoḥ jāto ’rdhacandramāḥjātārddhacandramaḥ| ikaṅ ardhacandra dadi sakeṅ vindu|
tasmāt jagatsamudbhavaḥ| ikaṅ oṅkāra mijil sakiṅ ardhacandra||

candre pralīyate viśvam| ikaṅ oṅkāra līna riṅ ardhacandra|
candro vindau candra vindoḥcandraḥ vindoḥ pralīyate| ardhacandra līna riṅ vindu|
vinduḥ nāde pralīyateeven in lieu of odd pāda| ikaṅ vindu līnavindu| līna riṅ nāda|
nādaḥ līnan tu niṣkale| ikaṅ nāda līna riṅ niṣkala||

sa evaevaṁevam paramasūkṣmaṁ|
śivaṁ śivatamaṁ smṛtam← śivāc chivataraṁ smṛtam| sira śiva| sira śivatama|
niṣkalaḥniṣkalaniṣkalaḥ niṣkalo devaḥ← niṣkalān niṣkalo devaḥ niṣkalo devaḥ|
śūnyāt śūnyataraḥ paraḥ| sira ta śūnya sakeṅ śūnya| kalīṅanira viśeṣaśūnya sira||

yo viditvā mama deham yav vidhitvā karomy āhaṁyav vidhitvā karomy ahaṁsa-vipulā| vruh pva saṅ prajña ry āvak bhaṭāra śiva|
viśate paramañ chivam| sira ta mantuk ri pada bhaṭāra paramaśiva|
praviśet paramaṁ sukham| sira ta makāvak paramasukha|
śivatattvaṁ samākhyāntamśivatatvasamākyantaṁśivatatvasamakyāntaṁ| ike kocapan saṅ hyaṅ śivatattva|
na prakāśatiprakāśāti paṇḍitaiḥ| tātan varahakna de saṅ paṇḍita riṅ len||

prakāśayati yo mūrkhaḥ| tan varahakna riṅ janmamūrkha sira| hana pva vvaṅ mapuṅguṅ marahakәn ike saṅ hyaṅ haji siddhāntajñāna|
narakam pratipadyate| sira tatan vuruṅ umaṅguhakәn kapāpan||

devadaityamanuṣyāṇām|
mudrārcaṇavidhikramāt| kunaṅ ikaṅ mudrā| mvaṅ arcaṇa| saha vidhikrama| deva| daitya|vidhikrama| deva| daitya|vidhikrama| daitya| manuṣya| ya ta phalanya|
homabhasman tathā moham| kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ mahoma| mabhasma| yan tar vruh riṅ śaivasiddhāntajñānaśivasiddhāntajñāna| niyata moha| ṅa|
hūṁdhrūtkāram idaṁ mantram| ikaṅ mantra hūṁdhrūtkāra|
sakale na tu niṣkalam| riṅ sakala ikā| kunaṅ ikaṅ niṣkala| tan maṅkana|
etat sarvam mahādevimahādevī| ikā ta kabeh bhaṭārī|
yo jñātvā svargadam mohāt| yan saṅ sādhaka karakәtaniṅ mudrārcaṇa| mvaṅ mantravidhikrama| ya ta tumәmuṅ svargaphala sira| makahīṅaniṅ svarga sira| saka ri puṅguṅnira riṅ niṣkalajñāna ikā|
mama māyāvimohitaḥ| ikā taṅta vvaṅ maṅkana| kәna deniṅ bañcanaṅku ikā|
mudrārcaṇavidhiṅ kuryāt| kunaṅ kagavayanikaṅ mudrārcaṇa| mvaṅ vidhikrama vidhikarmmāvidhikarmma|
argaḍaarghaḍa-mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ| yekā vaṅkәlan vaṁklaṁvvaṃ klaṃ saṅ mahyun iṅ kamokṣan||

namaskāran tathā devidevī|
śarīrasakalambhavaḥ| apan ikaṅ sәmbhah riṅ bhaṭāra|
yāvajjanma yāvā janma punarbhavam| amuhara kapunarbhavan ya| ndya taṅ kabañcana deṅku|
devāsuramanuṣyaś ca|
brahmaviṣṇumaheśvaraḥ| devata| daitya| manuṣya| adyapi brahmā| viṣṇu| maheśvara tuvitovī|
sarvam māyāvimohitaḥmāyavimohitaḥ| ikā ta kabeh kәna deniṅ bañcanaṅku|
tava māyāvimohitaḥmāyavimohitaḥ| kady aṅgān yan kәna deniṅ bañcananta bhaṭārī||

mokṣakaṅkṣī mahādevimahādevī| mataṅyan deya saṅ mahyun iṅ kamokṣan|
sarvakarma parityajet| tiṅgalaknanira tekaṅ sarvakarma mudrārcaṇādi|
yāvajjīvanyāvājjīvān tamoloke| salavasniṅsalavasniṃalavasniṃ huripnira hana riṅ loka| tiṅgalakna| ikaṅ tamah ṅke ri hati| ndya tekaṅ tiṅgalakna nihan lvirnya||

nihan taṅ mantra| hūṁdhrūtkāra| mvaṅ namaskāra| mudrā| arcaṇa| vidhihoma| sarvavidhāna| mvaṅ kagavayaniṅ bhasma| mvaṅ sarvayajñādi|
na vidyate iti sarvamsa-vipulā| ikā ta kabeh tan gavayakna|
bandhanaṁ mokṣakaṅkṣiṇaḥbandhanam mokṣakaṅkṣiṇaḥbandhanamokṣakaṅkṣiṇaḥbandhanam mokṣasaṃkṣiṇaḥ| ikā ta apushapusniṅ kamokṣan|
tyaktvātyaktatyaktam mokṣārthii for ī or iḥ, m.c. sarvathāsarvadā| ya ta mataṅyan tiṅgalakna tikaṅ mudrādi de saṅ mahyun iṅ kamokṣan| katiṅgal pva ya ta|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mantuk ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

homārcaṇavidhiṁ sarvam|
bhasmāyogyan tubhasmāyogyānta saṇmukham|
mudrāmantranamohūṁdhrūt| āpan ikā kabeh ānakku saṅ kumāra|
svargadan na ca mokṣadam| aṅhiṅ svarga hīṅanya| tar tәmuṅ kamokṣan|
tatraiva saktahṛdayeśaktaṁ hṛdaye|
sādhakophā(?)cako mantrasaṅyutaḥ| hana ta sādhaka saktaśakta riṅ mantra|
tadā vyāmoha-liṅgānāṁ| mvaṅ kabhyāsaniṅ liṅgakārya|
sakale na tu niṣkalam| sira ta umaṅguh ikaṅ sakala| tan tumәmuṅ niṣkala| tan mokṣa kalīṅanya|
kūṭamudrā tathā mantram|
evaṁ noccārayeddevatoccārayed vudhaḥ| maṅkana pva ya ikā saṅ paṇḍita| tātan maṅunyākәna kūṭamantra| mvaṅ kūṭamudrā|
idan tat niṣkalajñānam| kunaṅ ikaṅ niṣkalajñāna| ya ta kavruhana de saṅ yogī|
padam eva nirāśrayam| mataṅyan kavruhana ya| ikaṅ kanirāśrayan| apan kasurudan sukhaduhkha||\\ devī uvāca||

ātmanaḥ bāyavāḥ bhāgāḥbhāgaḥ|
tvayā pūrve tu vācakaḥ| ikaṅ ātmā vinarahakәn bhaṭāra ri ṅhulun ṅūni| pira ta kvehnya| bāyu avaknya liṅta| maṅkana liṅta|maṅkana liṅta| pājarakna hyaṅ mami tәmәntәmәn|\\ devovāca||

ātmāni śivarūpāni| rūpa bhaṭāra śiva ikā|
anekānianekan te varānane| maṅkana rūpanya tan tuṅgal|
jyotimayāni divyānijyotimāyāni divyānijyotimāyāni divyānī| teja pinakāvaknya nitya yanitya|
saṅsārāni pṛthak pṛthak| saṅsāra ya| mapalenan ta ya||

śivaṁ tattveśivatattve mahādevimahādevī|
āveśituṁavisātavavisāta(for āveṣṭum?) vicintayet| ikā ta kabeh| kinavruhan saṅ yogī tattvanya| ṅke ri saṅ hyaṅ śaivasiddhāntaśivasiddhānta bhaṭārī| dumehnikā tar lәpas|
māyena kṣamate mūrkhātmuktaṁ|
mudrān dehīdehi niṣevate| lāvan saṅ sādhaka maṅabhyāsamaṅabhyāṣapaṅabhyāṣa mudrā| sira ta kavәnaṅ deniṅ puṅguṅnira hetu| mataṅyan tan gavayakna saṅ yogī||

ihācintyam mahādevimahādevī|
tad evaevaṁ paramaṁ śivam| kunaṅ ikaṅ niṣkalajñāna| yāvaka bhaṭāra paramaśiva| yekājaraknaṅku ri kita bhaṭārī||

niṣkaleva mahātmāniniṣkalevam mahātmāṇi|
tāvajtāvājtāvā jyotir nirātmakaḥ| avak bhaṭāra tāvat niṣkala sira| tar pāvak teja|
na śarīran na cendriyam| tan paśarīra| tan pendriya| kaivalyamkevalyamkevalam āvak niṣkala|
yo jñātvā tattvavic chūnyam|
niṣkalañ chivasaṅjñakam| ikā tāvak bhaṭāra niṣkala| kavruhana saṅ tattvavit|
tyaktvā liṅgan tu niṣkalam| yan sirāvak niṣkala| tumiṅgal irikaṅ liṅga|
liṅgamūrtis tu niṣkalam| ikānāvak bhaṭāra yan sakala liṅga| ya tikā niṣkalaliṅgāvakniraniścalaliṅgāvaknira| tiniṅgalakәn pvekaṅ liṅga|
śivaṁ kṣaṇan tataḥtathā param| riṅ kṣaṇa sirān mantuk riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva muvah||

sarvakarmāṇi yaḥ kṛtvā| saṅ vruh riṅ niṣkalajñāna sira tar apilih ri kagavayaniragavayanira|
aśubhāni śubhāni ca| halāhayu ginavayakәnirerikā|
yathecchā kurute devidevī| āsiṅ sakahyunira| ginavayakәn||
sa eva paramārthavit| maṅkana deyanira saṅ vruh riṅ paramārtha| i vruhira riṅ niṣkalajñāna||

praṇavajñānamāhātmyā| ike saṅ hyaṅ praṇavajñāna| māhātmya sira|
tantre durlabhalakṣaṇam| evәh kalakṣaṇānira riṅ haji vaneh|
etattantreekatantre mahādevi| ike hajinta ṅke mevәh ta ya bhaṭāri|
yathecchā kurute sadāyadā| saṅ vruh riṅ kaviśeṣan saṅ hyaṅ praṇavajñāna| sira ta yathecchā ri kagavayanira kagavayanirāngavayanirān sadā||

jñānasaṅkṣepanirsthityam|
śivaproktaviśeṣitamśīvam proktavviśeṣitaṁ| ikā ta pavarahvarah bhaṭāra śiva| jñānasaṅkṣepa ikā| mvaṅ ri tan sthityaniṅ jñāna saṅ yogī riṅ vidhikrama| hetunikā inajarakәn de bhaṭara||

p.foreign: iti jñānasaṅkṣepan nāma śāstram| tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Bhuvanakośa, Paṭala 9
div.ab: Bhuvanakośaṁ, Navamaḥ Paṭalaḥ
nihan pavarah bhaṭāra ri ṅhulun ṅūni| ike saṅ yogī| yar vruha sireṅ niṣkalajñāna| āpan ikā hīṅaniṅ sarvajyoti| niyatanira tar valuya janma liṅta||

lg.l: maṇḍalāni mam uktānimamoktānifor mām uktāni, m.c. |

div.ab: nāhan pavarah ripavarahani ṅhulun| saṅ sādhaka yar vruha sira yan sarvadevatāvakniṅ maṇḍala| niyata sira tar valuyāṅjanma liṅ bhaṭāra||
nihan ta vaneh| ikaṅ mudrārcaṇa sakvehnya| mvaṅ sahananiṅ prayoga ikā kabeh| yekā ta gavayakna saṅ yogī nityakāla| ikā ta saṅ yogīśvarān gumavayakәn| sira ta mantuk ri pada bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
div.p:
śaivatantre vidhiṁ sarvam|
tadvat saṅsārabhāṣitam| ikā taṅ mudrā sahananya| tadvat varahakna pva ya muvah| aṅde saṅsāra ṅke ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta ri ṅhulun|
kiṁ mithyākim advā kiṁ idaṁ satyam|
kathaya me tathayāmikathayāmi sureśvara| syapa tekādvā| syapa tuhu veh| sājñā bhaṭāra||

prajñaṁ paramadevatvam|
śivena kin tathā tvayātvayi| ikaṅ tattva bhaṭāra paramaśiva| sira ta makāvak prajñamāknāthava liṅta|
śaivatantreṣuśivatantreṣu durlabdhe| mevәh ta katәmvanikā ṅke| ri saṅ hyaṅ dharma siddhāntajñāna||
kim asatyaṁ punaḥ satyam| advā tuhu kari ya| yekojarakna ri ṅhulun muvah||\\ an maṅkana vuvus bhaṭārī| devovāca||

mām eva kathitaṁ pūrvam|
śivenaśiṣyena paramañ chivam| om bhaṭāra paramaśivāmarah ṅhulun| an pavarah saṅsāra ikaṅ mudrādi| maṅkana liṅnire ṅhulun|
tad evaevaṅ kathitaṁ sarvam|
tāvad eva varānane| ya ta mataṅyan inajarakәn ri kita| nahannihan takvantery aku ṅūni||

nirasatyaṁ tathāmṛṣyamtadāmṛṣyaṁ|
tvam eva ca sureśvarisureśvarī| tātan pāvak ādvā tuhu bhaṭārī| kady aṅgānku tan pāvak ādvā tuhu| maṅkana ta kita tan makāvakkita makāvak ādvā tuhu|
devamanuṣyatiryañdevamanuṣyatīryyaśdevamanuṣyatīryyarś ca|
mṛṣaṁ satyam varānanesatyav varānane| kunaṅ ikaṅ devata mvaṅ manuṣya tiryak| yekā makāvak ikaṅ dvā tuhu||
div.ab: nihan taṅ yajña| tapa| brata| dharma| vidhikrama| yekā tuhu bhaṭārī| nā taṅ kavruhana| guṇa| mvaṅ māri vruh| ikā ta kabeh| ya ta ginavayakәn ikaṅ vvaṅ satata||
div.p:
yeṣu yeṣu mahādevimahādevī|
santataṁ saktamānasaḥśaktamānasaḥ| ikā taṅ vvaṅ saktaśakta manahnya riṅ dharma|
tair eva vṛttibandhanam| ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kāpusan ikā deniṅ ulah| mataṅyan tar lpas|
yogiṇe mama mohitaḥ| kalīṅanya mapuṅguṅ ri ṅhulun ike saṅ yogī yan gumavayakәn ikaṅ mudrādi||

tyaktvārcaṇavidhin devidevī|
śaivatantreṣu ca sadāśaivatantreṇa cetasā| mataṅyan deya saṅ yogī| nitya sirātiṅgala irikaṅ mudrārcaṇavidhi| ṅkeṅ aji siddhānta|
prayojanaṅ parityajyaparityajyā| mvaṅ ikaṅ prayojana tiṅgalaknanira ta ya|
paścāt paśupater iva| kady aṅgānyān ināryakәn saṅ hyaṅ paśupati| iva maṅkana tāryākәn ike hajinta ṅke||

mama rūpāṇi sarvāni|
mudrādīnimudrādīnām varānane| ikā ta kabeh| ikaṅ mudrādi| rūpani ṅhulun ikā bhaṭārī||
mama rūpāṇi sarvāni|
asitādīni ṣaṇmukhahāsītādini sanmukhaṁ| maṅkana tānakkuta kitānaku saṅ kumāra| sakvehnikaṅ asitādihāsitādi avakni ṅhulun ikā||

yo jñātvā sakalan devidevī| ikā ta varahku ri kita| yekā avakniṅ deva sakala| ya ta kinavruhan saṅ yogī|
prāṇaḥ saṅsāravibhramaḥ| sira ta mamaṅguh saṅsāra bhāvacakra||
jyotiś śivamayan devidevī| mvaṅ saṅ vruh ry avak bhaṭārān toñ jyoti| saṅsāra ta kapaṅguh denikā mvaṅ bhāvacakra||

mama guhyan tathātava jñānam| saṅsāra pvaṅmvaṅ maṅkana| ya ta mataṅyan rәṅvāknanta ike jñānaṅku viśeṣa bhaṭārī|
śṛṇu śrotevaśrotāya tat pūrvamodd in lieu of even pāda| kadyaṅgantāṅrәṅə̄ varahvarahkv i ṅūni| maṅkana ta karәṅvān ikaṅ niṣkalajñāna||

yoginaḥ mokṣakāryārthī|
